GK21sokss_pu:12381: namrā niścayadattaṃ taṃ kuhyakī sā vyajijñapat // SoKss_7,3.79 //
GK21sokss_pu:12383: tad asmin kānane kānte gamayedaṃ dinaṃ prabho // SoKss_7,3.80 //
GK21sokss_pu:12384: phalāni bhuṅkṣva svādūni nirjharāmbhaḥ śubhaṃ piba /
GK21sokss_pu:12385: ahaṃ yāmi nijaṃ sthānameṣyāmi ca niśāgame // SoKss_7,3.81 //
GK21sokss_pu:12389: yakṣiṇī punarāgantuṃ satyasaṃdhā jagāma sā // SoKss_7,3.83 //
GK21sokss_pu:12391: agādhamantaḥ saviṣaṃ svacchaśītaṃ bahiḥ saraḥ // SoKss_7,3.84 //
GK21sokss_pu:12397: sphurantau dvāv apaśyac ca bhuvaṃ tāṃ nicakhāna ca // SoKss_7,3.87 //
GK21sokss_pu:12399: śiro dadarśa te cāsya padmarāgāvivākṣiṇī // SoKss_7,3.88 //
GK21sokss_pu:12403: kathayiṣyāmi te sādho svavṛttāntaṃ tato 'khilam // SoKss_7,3.90 //
GK21sokss_pu:12407: uvāca dattāḥ prāṇā me kṛcchrāduddharatā tvayā // SoKss_7,3.92 //
GK21sokss_pu:12408: tad ehi yāvac chrāntas tvam upayuṅkṣva phalāmbunī /
GK21sokss_pu:12409: tvatprasādādahaṃ cāpi kariṣye pāraṇaṃ cirāt // SoKss_7,3.93 //
GK21sokss_pu:12417: tasya patnyāṃ suvṛttāyāṃ jāto 'smyeṣa sutaḥ sakhe // SoKss_7,3.97 //
GK21sokss_pu:12428: tatra māṃ sthāpayitvā ca gatvā guptaṃ tadaiva sā /
GK21sokss_pu:12430: ānītaiva ca sā me 'tra kaṇṭhāśleṣam upāgamat /
GK21sokss_pu:12431: ekavīro hi nārīṇāmatibhūmiṃ gataḥ smaraḥ // SoKss_7,3.104 //
GK21sokss_pu:12432: evaṃ dine dine svairam āgatyātra piturgṛhāt /
GK21sokss_pu:12433: araṃsta bandhudattā sā mayā saha sakhīgṛhe // SoKss_7,3.105 //
GK21sokss_pu:12434: ekadā tāṃ nijagṛhaṃ netuṃ tatra cirasthitām /
GK21sokss_pu:12435: āgataḥ sa patis tasyā mathurāto mahāvaṇik // SoKss_7,3.106 //
GK21sokss_pu:12438: niścitaṃ sakhi netavyā bhartrāhaṃ mathurāṃ purīm /
GK21sokss_pu:12439: na ca jīvāmy ahaṃ tatra somasvāmivinākṛtā // SoKss_7,3.108 //
GK21sokss_pu:12441: sakhī sukhaśayā nāma yoginī tāṃ jagāda sā // SoKss_7,3.109 //
GK21sokss_pu:12442: dvau sto mantraprayogau me yayorekena sūtrake /
GK21sokss_pu:12443: kaṇṭhabaddhe jhagityeva mānuṣo markaṭo bhavet // SoKss_7,3.110 //
GK21sokss_pu:12444: dvitīyena ca mukte 'smin sūtrake saiṣa mānuṣaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:12445: punarbhavetkapitve ca nāsya prajñā vilupyate // SoKss_7,3.111 //
GK21sokss_pu:12446: tadyadīcchati suśroṇi somasvāmī priyaḥ sa te /
GK21sokss_pu:12447: tadetaṃ markaṭaśiśuṃ saṃpratyeva karomy aham // SoKss_7,3.112 //
GK21sokss_pu:12449: mantrayuktidvayaṃ caitad bhavatīṃ śikṣayāmy aham // SoKss_7,3.113 //
GK21sokss_pu:12451: rahaḥsthāne ca puruṣaṃ priyaṃ saṃpādayiṣyasi // SoKss_7,3.114 //
GK21sokss_pu:12452: evam uktā tayā sakhyā bandhudattā tathaiva sā /
GK21sokss_pu:12454: kṛtānujñaṃ ca māṃ baddhamantrasūtraṃ gale kṣaṇāt /
GK21sokss_pu:12457: sakhyā mahyaṃ vinodāya datto 'sāv ity adarśayat // SoKss_7,3.117 //
GK21sokss_pu:12458: atuṣyatsa ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā krīḍanīyaṃ tadaṅkagam /
GK21sokss_pu:12459: ahaṃ ca kapirevāsaṃ prājño 'pi vyaktavāgapi // SoKss_7,3.118 //
GK21sokss_pu:12461: tathātiṣṭhamahaṃ ko hi kāmena na viḍambyate // SoKss_7,3.119 //
GK21sokss_pu:12463: mathurāṃ prati sā prāyādbhartrā saha piturgṛhāt // SoKss_7,3.120 //
GK21sokss_pu:12465: sa bhartā bandhudattāyāḥ pathi tatpriyakāmyayā // SoKss_7,3.121 //
GK21sokss_pu:12466: tato vayaṃ te sarve 'pi yānto madhye pathi sthitam /
GK21sokss_pu:12470: āgatya khādituṃ te ca prārabhanta plavaṃgamāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:12472: sa tena vihvalaḥ skandhāttyaktvaiva bhuvi māṃ bhayāt /
GK21sokss_pu:12473: palāyito 'bhūd atha mām agṛhṇaṃs te 'tra markaṭāḥ // SoKss_7,3.125 //
GK21sokss_pu:12474: matsnehād bandhudattā ca tadbhartā tasya cānugāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:12475: pāṣāṇair laguḍair ghnanto jetuṃ tān nāśakan kapīn // SoKss_7,3.126 //
GK21sokss_pu:12476: tatas te markaṭā mūḍhasyāṅge 'ṅge loma loma me /
GK21sokss_pu:12477: nakhair vyalumpan dantaiś ca kukarmakupitā iva // SoKss_7,3.127 //
GK21sokss_pu:12488: bhavitavyaniyuktā ca jāne sā kāpi devatā /
GK21sokss_pu:12490: āśvāsyamāne caitasmin na mṛto 'smi na kevalam /
GK21sokss_pu:12492: tāvatkālaṃ ca naivāsītkṣuttṛṣṇā ca sakhe mama /
GK21sokss_pu:12494: jñāne prāpte 'pi śaktirme tāvatī naiva vidyate /
GK21sokss_pu:12497: yoginī me tadā bhūyo bhavitāsmīha mānuṣaḥ // SoKss_7,3.137 //
GK21sokss_pu:12498: ity eṣa mama vṛttāntastvaṃ tvagamyamidaṃ vanam /
GK21sokss_pu:12499: kim āgataḥ kathaṃ ceti brūhīdānīṃ vayasya me // SoKss_7,3.138 //
GK21sokss_pu:12501: ukto niścayadattaḥ svaṃ tasmai vṛttāntam abravīt // SoKss_7,3.139 //
GK21sokss_pu:12503: ānīto dhairyajitayā yakṣiṇyā ca tayā niśi // SoKss_7,3.140 //
GK21sokss_pu:12505: dhīmānniścayadattaṃ taṃ somasvāmī jagāda saḥ // SoKss_7,3.141 //
GK21sokss_pu:12506: anubhūtaṃ tvayā duḥkhaṃ may aiva strīkṛte mahat /
GK21sokss_pu:12507: na ca śriyaḥ striyaśceha kadācitkasyacitsthirāḥ // SoKss_7,3.142 //
GK21sokss_pu:12514: mā gā vidyādharapurīṃ tāṃ sakhe puṣkarāvatīm /
GK21sokss_pu:12516: kuru madvacanaṃ mittraṃ pūrvaṃ mittravaco mayā /
GK21sokss_pu:12517: na kṛtaṃ rāgiṇā tena paritapye 'dhunāpyaham // SoKss_7,3.147 //
GK21sokss_pu:12519: vārayan bhavaśarmākhyaḥ suhṛn mām evam abravīt // SoKss_7,3.148 //
GK21sokss_pu:12520: striyāḥ sakhe vaśaṃ mā gāḥ strīcittaṃ hy atidurgamam /
GK21sokss_pu:12521: tathā ca mama yadvṛttaṃ tad idaṃ vacmi te śṛṇu // SoKss_7,3.149 //
GK21sokss_pu:12523: brāhmaṇī somadā nāma capalā guptayoginī // SoKss_7,3.150 //
GK21sokss_pu:12524: tayā ca saha me daivātsamabhūtsaṃgamo rahaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:12534: sā jñānataḥ somadayā viditvā māṃ paśūkṛtam /
GK21sokss_pu:12535: mumoca kaṇṭhāt sūtraṃ me madgosvāminyapaśyati // SoKss_7,3.156 //
GK21sokss_pu:12537: palāyitaṃ māṃ manvāno matsvāmī prābhramaddiśaḥ // SoKss_7,3.157 //
GK21sokss_pu:12538: ahaṃ ca bandhamocinyā tayā saha tato vrajan /
GK21sokss_pu:12540: sā krodhena jvalantī tāṃ jñāninīṃ bandhamocinīm /
GK21sokss_pu:12544: ity uktvaiva gatāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ sā siddhayoginī /
GK21sokss_pu:12548: tato yuddhe pravṛtte nau pṛṣṭhataḥ khaḍgapāṇinā /
GK21sokss_pu:12551: āgaccherityuditvā sā gṛhaṃ me svamadarśayat // SoKss_7,3.164 //
GK21sokss_pu:12559: nihatā bandhamocinyā tayā sā somadā tataḥ // SoKss_7,3.168 //
GK21sokss_pu:12561: na kustrīsaṃgamaṃ bhūyo manasā samacintayam // SoKss_7,3.169 //
GK21sokss_pu:12563: doṣāḥ strīṇāṃ trayaḥ prāyo lokatrayabhayāvahāḥ // SoKss_7,3.170 //
GK21sokss_pu:12565: sneho yasyā na patyau sve tasyāstu tvayy asau kutaḥ // SoKss_7,3.171 //
GK21sokss_pu:12566: evam ukto 'py ahaṃ tena mitreṇa bhavaśarmaṇā /
GK21sokss_pu:12567: nākārṣaṃ vacanaṃ tasya prāpto 'smīmāṃ gatiṃ tataḥ // SoKss_7,3.172 //
GK21sokss_pu:12569: kleśaṃ sā hi svajātīye prāpte tvāṃ tyakṣyati dhruvam // SoKss_7,3.173 //
GK21sokss_pu:12570: bhṛṅgīva puṣpaṃ puruṣaṃ strī vāñchati navaṃ navam /
GK21sokss_pu:12571: ato 'nutāpo bhavitā mam eva bhavataḥ sakhe // SoKss_7,3.174 //
GK21sokss_pu:12574: uvāca sa kapiṃ taṃ hi na sā vyabhicarenmayi /
GK21sokss_pu:12575: vidyādharādhipakule śuddhe jātā hy asāviti // SoKss_7,3.176 //
GK21sokss_pu:12577: yayau niścayadattasya priyecchur iva bhāskaraḥ // SoKss_7,3.177 //
GK21sokss_pu:12579: sā śṛṅgotpādinī tasya nikaṭaṃ tatra yakṣiṇī // SoKss_7,3.178 //
GK21sokss_pu:12581: prayātum āpṛcchya kapiṃ smartavyo 'smīti vādinam // SoKss_7,3.179 //
GK21sokss_pu:12582: niśīthe ca himādrau tām anurāgaparā pituḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:12589: natvā niścayadattaṃ tamatha sā yakṣiṇī yayau // SoKss_7,3.183 //
GK21sokss_pu:12593: avartamānaḥ sve dehe tanuṃ tasyā ivāviśat // SoKss_7,3.185 //
GK21sokss_pu:12594: tena gāndharvavidhinā bhāryā bhūtvātha tasya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:12595: anurāgaparā sadyo vidyayā nirmame puram // SoKss_7,3.186 //
GK21sokss_pu:12596: tasmin niścayadatto 'sau bāhye tasthau tayā saha /
GK21sokss_pu:12598: pṛṣṭas tāṃs tādṛśāṃs tasyai mārgakleśāñ śaśaṃsa yat /
GK21sokss_pu:12599: tena sā bahu mene taṃ bhogaiś ceṣṭair upācarat // SoKss_7,3.188 //
GK21sokss_pu:12602: jagāda caitan mittraṃ me tvatprayatnena kenacit /
GK21sokss_pu:12603: tiryaktvādyadi mucyeta tatpriye sukṛtaṃ bhavet // SoKss_7,3.190 //
GK21sokss_pu:12604: ity uktā tena sāvocad anurāgaparāpi tam /
GK21sokss_pu:12605: yoginyā mantramārgo 'yaṃ nāsmākaṃ viṣayaḥ punaḥ // SoKss_7,3.191 //
GK21sokss_pu:12608: tac chrutvā sa vaṇikputro hṛṣṭastām avadatpriyām /
GK21sokss_pu:12609: tarhi taṃ paśya manmittramehi yāva tadantikam // SoKss_7,3.193 //
GK21sokss_pu:12611: vyomnā niścayadatto 'gāt sakhyus tasyāspadaṃ vanam // SoKss_7,3.194 //
GK21sokss_pu:12612: tatra taṃ suhṛdasṃ dṛṣṭvā kapirūpamupetya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:12615: dṛṣṭo mayeti so 'py uktvā somasvāmikapiḥ kila // SoKss_7,3.196 //
GK21sokss_pu:12617: tataḥ sarve 'py upāvikṣaṃs tatra ramye śilātale // SoKss_7,3.197 //
GK21sokss_pu:12618: cakruś ca tatkathālāpaṃ tattattasya kapeḥ kṛte /
GK21sokss_pu:12619: ādau niścayadattena cintitaṃ kāntayā saha // SoKss_7,3.198 //
GK21sokss_pu:12620: tatas taṃ kapimāpṛcchya preyasīsadanaṃ ca tat /
GK21sokss_pu:12623: ehi tasyāntikaṃ sakhyuḥ kṣaṇaṃ yāva kaperiti // SoKss_7,3.200 //
GK21sokss_pu:12624: tataḥ sāpi tamāha sma tvamevādya vraja svayam /
GK21sokss_pu:12626: ity uktaḥ sa tadādāya tadvidyādvitayaṃ tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:12627: vyomnā niścayadatto 'gāt sakhyus tasyāntikaṃ kapeḥ // SoKss_7,3.202 //
GK21sokss_pu:12628: tatra yāvatsa kurute tena sākaṃ ciraṃ kathāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:12633: vidyādharīṃ sa tāṃ buddhvā vidyayā martyabhartṛkām // SoKss_7,3.205 //
GK21sokss_pu:12634: sāpy upetaṃ tam ālokya subhagaṃ vinatānanā /
GK21sokss_pu:12635: kastvaṃ kim āgato 'sīti śanaiḥ papraccha kautukāt // SoKss_7,3.206 //
GK21sokss_pu:12637: viddhi vidyādharaṃ mugdhe nāmnā māṃ rājabhañjanam // SoKss_7,3.207 //
GK21sokss_pu:12639: manobhuvā vaśīkṛtya tubhyam eva samarpitaḥ // SoKss_7,3.208 //
GK21sokss_pu:12641: pitā vetti na yāvatte tāvattulyaṃ bhajasva mām // SoKss_7,3.209 //
GK21sokss_pu:12644: tato labdhvāśayaṃ cakre bhāryā tenaiva tatra sā /
GK21sokss_pu:12645: apekṣate dvayoraikacittye kiṃ rahasi smaraḥ // SoKss_7,3.211 //
GK21sokss_pu:12651: asvāsthyam eva matvāsyā duḥkhaṃ tadanayaddinam // SoKss_7,3.214 //
GK21sokss_pu:12652: prātaś ca durmanā bhūyastaṃ kapiṃ suhṛdaṃ prati /
GK21sokss_pu:12654: yāte tasminn upāgāt tāṃ so 'nurāgaparāṃ punaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:12661: so 'pi papraccha taṃ kṛtvā svāgataṃ vānaraḥ suhṛt // SoKss_7,3.219 //
GK21sokss_pu:12663: tato niścayadatto 'pi sa taṃ vānaram abravīt // SoKss_7,3.220 //
GK21sokss_pu:12665: tenāsmi duḥsthitaḥ sā hi prāṇebhyo 'pi priyā mama // SoKss_7,3.221 //
GK21sokss_pu:12666: ity uktas tena sa jñānī markaṭastam abhāṣata /
GK21sokss_pu:12667: gaccha suptāmidānīṃ tāṃ sthitāṃ kṛtvāṅgavartinīm // SoKss_7,3.222 //
GK21sokss_pu:12670: tac chrutvā khena gatvaiva so 'nurāgaparāṃ tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:12672: taṃ tu vidyādharaṃ tasyā nāṅge lagnaṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:12675: ānināya kapes tasya sa somasvāmino 'ntikam // SoKss_7,3.226 //
GK21sokss_pu:12677: yena vidyādharaṃ tasyāḥ kaṇṭhe lagnaṃ dadarśa saḥ // SoKss_7,3.227 //
GK21sokss_pu:12678: dṛṣṭvā ca hā dhigetatkimiti taṃ vādinaṃ kapiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:12679: sa eva tattvadarśī tadyathāvṛttam abodhayat // SoKss_7,3.228 //

GK21sokss_pu:13286: tataḥ so 'gniśikho mūrkhaḥ śaṭho bhūyo 'py uvāca tam /

GK21sokss_pu:13306: tato 'pi paścād āgacchet sa te dhūmaśikho yadi /

GK21sokss_pu:13310: evaṃ kṛte hi nirdainyastvam ihaiṣyasi mā ca te /

GK21sokss_pu:15099: mama sūryaprabheṇādau sutā nītā tatas tava // SoKss_8,1.99 //
GK21sokss_pu:15100: kṛtaṃ cādya tvayā sakhyaṃ taiḥ saheti mayā śrutam /
GK21sokss_pu:15101: tanmamāpi tathaiva tvaṃ sakhyaṃ taiḥ saha sādhaya // SoKss_8,1.100 //
GK21sokss_pu:15102: āyāntu te mama gṛhaṃ yāvatsūryaprabhāya tām /
GK21sokss_pu:15105: rambhasya śraddadhe candraprabho rājā tadā vacaḥ // SoKss_8,1.102 //
GK21sokss_pu:15106: prahastaṃ prekṣya ca kṣipraṃ śākalāttām anāyayat /
GK21sokss_pu:15108: anyedyuś ca vimānena sa ca sūryaprabhaś ca saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15109: rambho vīrabhaṭaḥ sarve kāñcīṃ te sānugā yayuḥ // SoKss_8,1.104 //
GK21sokss_pu:15111: kāñcīṃ kāñcīm iva bhuvaḥ prāviśan guṇagumphitām // SoKss_8,1.105 //
GK21sokss_pu:15112: tatratāṃ vidhinā dattvā sutāṃ sūryaprabhāya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15121: ity uktas tena tatrāhaṃ prastāve ca mayoditam // SoKss_8,1.110 //
GK21sokss_pu:15123: gaccha kāntimatīṃ tarhi tāṃ prāpaya tadantikam // SoKss_8,1.111 //
GK21sokss_pu:15124: tatas tatra vayaṃ yāma ity uktas tena bhūbhṛtā /
GK21sokss_pu:15126: prātaś ca te sakumbhīrāḥ sarve candraprabhādayaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15130: dadau tasyi tadā kāntimatyai sūryaprabhāya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:15135: hṛtā kenāpi naciraṃ parapuṣṭeti me sutā // SoKss_8,1.117 //
GK21sokss_pu:15136: jñātaṃ cehāda yatprāptā hastaṃ sūryaprabhasya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:15139: anyathā śatravo yūyaṃ mama yuṣmākam apy aham // SoKss_8,1.119 //
GK21sokss_pu:15140: ity uktvā svāmivacanaṃ dūtastūṣṇīṃ babhūva saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15143: tac chrutvā tasya siddhārthanāmā mantryevam abhyadhāt // SoKss_8,1.121 //
GK21sokss_pu:15144: nānyathā deva mantavyaṃ vaktum evaṃ hi so 'rhati /
GK21sokss_pu:15145: sa hi rājā mahādātā paṇḍitaḥ satkulodgataḥ // SoKss_8,1.122 //
GK21sokss_pu:15147: viruddhaṃ kiṃ nu tenoktaṃ yathāvastvabhidhāyinā // SoKss_8,1.123 //
GK21sokss_pu:15149: tadgantavyaṃ gṛhe tasya satyasaṃdho nṛpo hi saḥ // SoKss_8,1.124 //
GK21sokss_pu:15151: iti siddhārthavacanaṃ sarve śraddadhuratra te // SoKss_8,1.125 //
GK21sokss_pu:15153: prahastaṃ vyasṛjattaṃ ca dūtaṃ tasyāpyamānayat // SoKss_8,1.126 //
GK21sokss_pu:15154: prahastaś ca sa gatvā taṃ kauśāmbīśaṃ sasaṃvidam /
GK21sokss_pu:15156: so 'pi rājā tamevāśu prahastaṃ preṣya śākalāt /
GK21sokss_pu:15161: prahvastān pūjayām āsa sa rājā janamejayaḥ // SoKss_8,1.130 //
GK21sokss_pu:15163: pañca hastisahasrāṇi lakṣaṃ ca varavājinām // SoKss_8,1.131 //
GK21sokss_pu:15165: bhārair bhṛtānām uṣṭrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇyapi pañca saḥ // SoKss_8,1.132 //
GK21sokss_pu:15171: bhītā ivāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā parasainyaṃ vihāyasā // SoKss_8,1.135 //
GK21sokss_pu:15172: tāvac ca tatkṣaṇaṃ vātuṃ pravṛtto 'bhūn mahānilaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15173: khecaraiḥ saha yuddhāya bhūcarānutkṣipann iva // SoKss_8,1.136 //
GK21sokss_pu:15174: kṣaṇāc ca dadṛśe vyomni vidyādharabalaṃ mahat /
GK21sokss_pu:15177: ekaṃ sūryaprabhādyāste paśyanti sma suvismitāḥ // SoKss_8,1.138 //
GK21sokss_pu:15179: re martya dharaṇigocara sūryaprabha nipata pādayorasya // SoKss_8,1.139 //
GK21sokss_pu:15180: praṇama ca re janamejaya bhavatā dattā sutā kim asthāne /
GK21sokss_pu:15181: ārādhaya tam imaṃ taddevaṃ naiṣo 'nyathā kṣamate // SoKss_8,1.140 //
GK21sokss_pu:15186: anūtpetuś ca sacivās tasya sarve dhṛtāyudhāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15187: prahastaś ca prabhāsaś ca bhāsaḥ siddhārtha eva ca // SoKss_8,1.143 //
GK21sokss_pu:15189: vidyādharāṇāṃ taiḥ sākaṃ prāvartata mahāhavaḥ // SoKss_8,1.144 //
GK21sokss_pu:15191: khaḍgenāghnan ripūn gṛhṇaṃs tacchastrāṇi svacarmaṇā // SoKss_8,1.145 //
GK21sokss_pu:15192: te janāḥ kati saṃkhye ca lakṣasaṃkhyā nabhaścarāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15197: śirobhiś ca śarīraiś ca petuścandraprabhāgrataḥ // SoKss_8,1.148 //
GK21sokss_pu:15200: sūryaprabhaś ca saṃprāpya yuyudhe tena saṃmukham /
GK21sokss_pu:15204: chettumicchati yāvac ca śiras tasya vivellataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15205: tāvad āgatya nabhasā huṃkāro viṣṇunā kṛtaḥ // SoKss_8,1.152 //
GK21sokss_pu:15206: tac chrutvā vīkṣya ca hariṃ namrastadgauraveṇa saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15208: vadhamuktaṃ tamādāya bhaktaṃ kvāpi yayau hariḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15209: bhagavānsa hi sadbhaktam ihāmutra ca rakṣati // SoKss_8,1.154 //
GK21sokss_pu:15210: dāmodarānugāste ca yayuḥ sarve yatas tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15214: tato 'tra yāvat sarve te hṛṣṭāstatkathayā sthitāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15217: tamudghāṭya ca siddhārthaḥ sadasyevam avācayat // SoKss_8,1.158 //
GK21sokss_pu:15219: nītā me tanayāpahṛtya rajanau sattvena kenāpi yā sā prāptā tava sūnunetyavagataṃ yattena tuṣṭā vayam // SoKss_8,1.159 //
GK21sokss_pu:15220: tadyuktena sutena tena saha tatsūryaprabheṇodyamo yuṣmābhiḥ kriyatām anargalam ihāpyasmadgṛhābhyāgame /
GK21sokss_pu:15221: yāvattāṃ paralokataḥ punar iva pratyāgatāmātmajāṃ paśyāmaś ca vivāhakāryamadhunā kurmaś ca tasyā vayam // SoKss_8,1.160 //
GK21sokss_pu:15222: ity atra vācite lekhe siddhārthena tatheti saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15223: rājā candraprabho dūtaṃ saccakāra jaharṣa ca // SoKss_8,1.161 //
GK21sokss_pu:15225: tatsutām aparāntaṃ taṃ prahastaṃ preṣya satvaram // SoKss_8,1.162 //
GK21sokss_pu:15226: prātaś ca jagmuḥ sarve te kṛtvā sūryaprabhaṃ puraḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15230: dadau ca candrikāvatyai so 'syai ratnādikaṃ tathā /
GK21sokss_pu:15235: sutā sulocanā nītā śrīmatsūryaprabheṇa me // SoKss_8,1.167 //
GK21sokss_pu:15236: tato me naiva saṃtāpastadyuktaḥ kiṃ tu madgṛham /
GK21sokss_pu:15237: ānīyatāṃ sa yuṣmābhirācāraṃ yad vidadhmahe // SoKss_8,1.168 //
GK21sokss_pu:15238: tac chrutvaiva mudābhyarcya dūtaṃ candraprabho nṛpaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15240: tataḥ sasubhaṭāḥ sarve saha sūryaprabheṇa te /
GK21sokss_pu:15248: tataś candraprabho rājā hṛṣṭas tasyāpi tāṃ sutām /
GK21sokss_pu:15251: candraprabhādyāḥ sarve te cīnadeśaṃ sapauravāḥ // SoKss_8,1.175 //
GK21sokss_pu:15252: tatrāgre nirgato rājā nijakoṭṭaṃ praveśya tān /
GK21sokss_pu:15253: sa suroho 'pi duhituścakre vaivāhikaṃ vidhim // SoKss_8,1.176 //
GK21sokss_pu:15254: ādāc ca vidyunmālāyai tasyai sūryaprabhāya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:15256: tasthuś ca tatra te tais tair bhogaiś candraprabhādayaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15260: evaṃ sa bubhuje tatra tatra śvaśuraveśmani /
GK21sokss_pu:15265: āmantrya tatsutāyuktaḥ pitṛbhyāṃ saha sānugaḥ // SoKss_8,1.182 //
GK21sokss_pu:15267: svaṃ sa sūryaprabhaḥ prāyācchālakaṃ nagaraṃ kṛtī // SoKss_8,1.183 //
GK21sokss_pu:15268: kvacin nṛttāsaṅgaḥ kvacid api ca saṃgītakarasaḥ kvacit pānakrīḍā kvacana sudṛśāṃ maṇḍanavidhiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15269: kvacil labdhābīṣṭastutimukharavaitālikaravaḥ pure tasminn āsīt pramada iti tasyāgamanajaḥ // SoKss_8,1.184 //
GK21sokss_pu:15270: tatrānyāḥ pitṛveśmasu sthitavatīrānāyya sa svapriyā dattais tatpitṛbhir gajāśvanivahais tābhiḥ sahaivāgataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15271: nānāratnasupūrṇabhāravinatair uṣṭraiś ca saṃkhyātigair līlādarśitadigjayotthavibhavaś cakre prajākautukam // SoKss_8,1.185 //
GK21sokss_pu:15273: suradhanadabhujaganagaraiḥ kṛtam iva tac chākalaṃ vibabhau // SoKss_8,1.186 //
GK21sokss_pu:15274: tato madanasenayā saha sa tatra sūryaprabho yathābhimatabhogabhuksakalapūrṇasaṃpatsukhī /

GK21sokss_pu:15276: iti mahākaviśrīsomadevabhaṭṭaviracite kathāsaritsāgare sūryaprabhalambake prathamas taraṅgaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15281: akasmād atra vasudhā sabhāmadhye vyadīryata // SoKss_8,2.2 //
GK21sokss_pu:15282: tato bhūvivarād ādau saśabdaḥ surabhir marut /

GK21sokss_pu:15288: bhuktā bhogā ime bhaumā bhavadbhir adhunā ca vaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:15293: sumeruś ca sahāyatve bandhubuddhyā sthito 'tra naḥ // SoKss_8,2.8 //
GK21sokss_pu:15294: rakṣeḥ sūryaprabhaṃ dadyās tvaṃ caitasmai nijāṃ sutām /
GK21sokss_pu:15295: ity ādāv eva devena sa hy ādiṣṭaḥ pinākinā // SoKss_8,2.9 //
GK21sokss_pu:15299: saṃvibheje mayādeśāt saṃvibhaktā na ye purā // SoKss_8,2.11 //

GK21sokss_pu:15308: tad ayuktaṃ yad asmābhir dattaṃ hi śrutaśarmaṇe /

GK21sokss_pu:15311: kurudhve tad vināśāya niścitaṃ vaḥ prakalpate // SoKss_8,2.17 //
GK21sokss_pu:15312: pūrvaṃ ca rudrayajñena yajamāno bhavān mayā /

GK21sokss_pu:15315: yad ācaratha darpeṇa bhavatāṃ na śivāya tat // SoKss_8,2.19 //
GK21sokss_pu:15316: ity ukte śakrasaṃdeśe nāradena vihasya tam /

GK21sokss_pu:15318: sūryaprabhasya martyatvaṃ yad vakti tad apārthakam /
GK21sokss_pu:15319: tad dāmodarasaṅgrāme na jñātaṃ tena tasya kim // SoKss_8,2.21 //
GK21sokss_pu:15321: aindraṃ na sādhitaṃ pūrvaṃ padaṃ kiṃ nahuṣādibhiḥ // SoKss_8,2.22 //
GK21sokss_pu:15322: yac cāha dattam asmābhiḥ sāmrājyaṃ śrutaśarmaṇe /
GK21sokss_pu:15323: kramāgataṃ ca tat tasyety etad apy asamañjasam // SoKss_8,2.23 //
GK21sokss_pu:15324: dātā maheśvaro yatra prāmāṇyaṃ tatra kasya kim /
GK21sokss_pu:15325: jyeṣṭhāgataṃ hiraṇyākṣasyendratvaṃ ca kathaṃ hṛtam // SoKss_8,2.24 //
GK21sokss_pu:15326: yac cāparaṃ prātipakṣyam adharmaṃ cāha tan mṛṣā /
GK21sokss_pu:15327: sa eva hi haṭhāt svārthe prātipakṣyaṃ karoti naḥ // SoKss_8,2.25 //
GK21sokss_pu:15328: kaś cādharmo jigīṣāmo vayaṃ hi paripanthinam /
GK21sokss_pu:15329: na harāmo muner bhāryāṃ brahmahatyāṃ na kurmahe // SoKss_8,2.26 //
GK21sokss_pu:15331: tad asad rudrayajñe hi vihite 'nyaiḥ kim adhvaraiḥ // SoKss_8,2.27 //
GK21sokss_pu:15333: arcite devadeve ca śaṃbhau devo na ko 'rcitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15334: yac cāhaikaiva rudrāsthā na śiveti tad apy asat // SoKss_8,2.28 //
GK21sokss_pu:15335: kiṃ tatra devanivahair anyair yatrodyato haraḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15336: ravāv abhyudite 'nyāni kiṃ tejāṃsi cakāsati // SoKss_8,2.29 //
GK21sokss_pu:15337: tad etad devarājāya sarvaṃ vācyaṃ tvayā mune /
GK21sokss_pu:15338: vayaṃ ca prastutaṃ kurmaḥ sa yad vetti karotu tat // SoKss_8,2.30 //
GK21sokss_pu:15340: pratisaṃdeśam ādāya yayau surapatiṃ prati // SoKss_8,2.31 //
GK21sokss_pu:15341: gate tasmin munau so 'tra taṃ candraprabhabhūpatim /

GK21sokss_pu:15344: pakṣe devagaṇaiḥ sārdham asmaddveṣeṇa saṃyuge // SoKss_8,2.33 //
GK21sokss_pu:15346: yuṣmatpakṣe sthitā eva sahitā daityadānavaiḥ // SoKss_8,2.34 //
GK21sokss_pu:15349: tad vīrāḥ kurutodyogaṃ kārye 'sminn ity udīrite /
GK21sokss_pu:15350: mayena hṛṣṭāḥ sarve te tat tathaiveti menire // SoKss_8,2.36 //
GK21sokss_pu:15352: nṛpā vīrabhaṭādyās te ye cānye mittrabāndhavāḥ // SoKss_8,2.37 //
GK21sokss_pu:15354: punaś candraprabhaṃ bhūpam uvācaivaṃ mayāsuraḥ // SoKss_8,2.38 //
GK21sokss_pu:15355: kurudhvam adya rudrasya rātrau rājan mahābalim /

GK21sokss_pu:15357: etan mayavacaḥ śrutvā rājā candraprabho 'tha saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15358: rudrasya balisaṃbhāraṃ kārayām āsa tatkṣaṇam // SoKss_8,2.40 //
GK21sokss_pu:15360: candraprabhaḥ svayaṃ cakre baliṃ rudrasya bhaktitaḥ // SoKss_8,2.41 //
GK21sokss_pu:15362: sākṣād āvirabhūt tatra nandī bhūtagaṇādhipaḥ // SoKss_8,2.42 //
GK21sokss_pu:15364: manmukhenedam ādiṣṭaṃ svayaṃ devena śaṃbhunā // SoKss_8,2.43 //
GK21sokss_pu:15365: api śakraśatān mābhūd bhayaṃ vo matprasādataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15368: nandīśvaro bhūtagaṇaiḥ saha tatra tirodadhe // SoKss_8,2.45 //
GK21sokss_pu:15370: baliṃ samāpya homānte viveśa samayaḥ puram // SoKss_8,2.46 //
GK21sokss_pu:15371: prātaś ca devyā putreṇa rājabhiḥ sacivair yutam /
GK21sokss_pu:15372: ekāntasthaṃ ca taṃ candraprabhabhūpaṃ mayo 'bhyadhāt // SoKss_8,2.47 //
GK21sokss_pu:15373: śṛṇu rājan rahasyaṃ te vacmy adya cirarakṣitam /
GK21sokss_pu:15374: tvaṃ dānavaḥ sunīthākhyo mama putro mahābalaḥ // SoKss_8,2.48 //
GK21sokss_pu:15376: devāhave hatau jātau pitāputrau yuvām iha // SoKss_8,2.49 //
GK21sokss_pu:15377: tad dānavaśarīraṃ te saṃrakṣya sthāpitaṃ mayā /
GK21sokss_pu:15378: ālipya yuktyā divyābhir oṣadhībhir ghṛtena ca // SoKss_8,2.50 //
GK21sokss_pu:15379: tasmāt praviśya vivaraṃ pātālam upanamya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:15380: praviśa svaṃ śarīraṃ tadyuktyā madupadiṣṭayā // SoKss_8,2.51 //
GK21sokss_pu:15382: tathā bhaviṣyasi yathā jeṣyasi dyucarān raṇe // SoKss_8,2.52 //
GK21sokss_pu:15385: etan mayāsurāc chrutvā tathety aṅgīcakāra saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15386: rājā candraprabho hṛṣṭaḥ siddhārthas tv idam uktavān // SoKss_8,2.54 //
GK21sokss_pu:15387: anyadehapraviṣṭaḥ kiṃ kim ayaṃ pañcatāṃ gataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15388: iti bhrāntau tadāsmākaṃ kā dhṛtir dānavottama // SoKss_8,2.55 //
GK21sokss_pu:15389: kiṃ caiṣa vismaraty asmāṃs tadā dehāntarāśritaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15390: paralokagato yadvat tataḥ ko 'yaṃ vayaṃ ca ke // SoKss_8,2.56 //
GK21sokss_pu:15391: etat siddhārthataḥ śrutvā sa jagāda mayāsuraḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15392: praviśantam imaṃ tasmiñ charīre yogayuktitaḥ // SoKss_8,2.57 //
GK21sokss_pu:15393: svatantraṃ yūyam āgatya sākṣāt tatraiva paśyata /
GK21sokss_pu:15394: na caivaṃ vismaraty eṣa yuṣmāñ śṛṇuta kāraṇam // SoKss_8,2.58 //
GK21sokss_pu:15395: asvatantro mṛto 'nyatra garbhe yo jāyate na saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15396: kiṃcit smaraty antaritaḥ kleśais tair maraṇādibhiḥ // SoKss_8,2.59 //
GK21sokss_pu:15398: antaḥkaraṇam āviśya praviśed indriyāṇi ca // SoKss_8,2.60 //
GK21sokss_pu:15400: sahasā sa smaraty eva jñānī yogeśvaro 'khilam // SoKss_8,2.61 //
GK21sokss_pu:15401: tasmād vikalpo mā bhūd vaḥ pratyutaiṣa nṛpo mahat /
GK21sokss_pu:15403: yūyaṃ ca dānavāḥ sarve praviśyaiva rasātalam /
GK21sokss_pu:15405: etan mayāsuravacaḥ śrutvā sarve tatheti te /
GK21sokss_pu:15409: tatrāvasthāpya nṛpatīn bahir nikṣipya teṣu ca /
GK21sokss_pu:15411: viveśa vivaraṃ toye saha sūryaprabheṇa saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15412: candraprabhaḥ samaṃ devyā siddhārthādyaiś ca mantribhiḥ // SoKss_8,2.67 //
GK21sokss_pu:15413: praviśya gatvā dīrghaṃ ca tenādhvānaṃ dadarśa saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15414: divyaṃ devakulaṃ tac ca sarvaiḥ saha viveśa taiḥ // SoKss_8,2.68 //
GK21sokss_pu:15415: tāvac ca ye sthitās tatra rājāno vivarād bahiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15416: teṣāṃ vidyādharā vyomnā sainyai saha samāpatan // SoKss_8,2.69 //
GK21sokss_pu:15417: te tān saṃstabhya māyābhir bhāryāḥ sūryaprabhasya tāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15418: aharaṃs tatkṣaṇaṃ caivam udagād bhāratī divaḥ // SoKss_8,2.70 //
GK21sokss_pu:15419: śrutaśarmann are pāpa yady etāś cakravartinaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15420: bhāryāḥ sprakṣyasi tat sadyaḥ sasainyo mṛtyum āpsyasi // SoKss_8,2.71 //
GK21sokss_pu:15421: tasmān mātṛvad etās tvaṃ paśyan rakṣeḥ sagauravam /
GK21sokss_pu:15422: adhunaiva na hatvā tvāṃ yad etā mocitā mayā // SoKss_8,2.72 //
GK21sokss_pu:15423: tatrāsti kāraṇaṃ kiṃcit tat tiṣṭhantv atra saṃprati /
GK21sokss_pu:15424: ity ukte divyayā vācā khecarās te tirodadhuḥ // SoKss_8,2.73 //
GK21sokss_pu:15425: rājānas te ca nītās tā dṛṣṭvā vīrabhaṭādayaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15427: naitāsām asti vidhvaṃsaḥ prāpsyathaitāḥ sutāḥ punaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15428: tat sāhasaṃ na yuṣmābhiḥ kāryaṃ kalyāṇam astu vaḥ // SoKss_8,2.75 //
GK21sokss_pu:15429: iti vāṅ nābhasī teṣāṃ tam udyogaṃ nyavārayat /
GK21sokss_pu:15430: tataḥ pratīkṣamāṇās te tasthus tatraiva bhūbhujaḥ // SoKss_8,2.76 //
GK21sokss_pu:15431: atrāntare ca pātāle tasmin devakule sthitam /
GK21sokss_pu:15432: sarvair vṛtam avocat tam evaṃ candraprabhaṃ mayaḥ // SoKss_8,2.77 //
GK21sokss_pu:15433: rajann ekamanā bhūtvā śṛṇv idānīm anuttamam /
GK21sokss_pu:15435: ity uktvākhyāya sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca sarahasyakam /
GK21sokss_pu:15436: yuktiṃ dehāntarāveśe tasmād upadideśa saḥ // SoKss_8,2.79 //
GK21sokss_pu:15437: jagāda ca sa yogīndraḥ saiṣā siddhir idaṃ ca tat /
GK21sokss_pu:15439: atraiśvarye sthitā mokṣaṃ na vāñchanti sureśvarāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15442: tathā ca śrūyatām atra kathāṃ vaḥ kathayāmy aham // SoKss_8,2.82 //
GK21sokss_pu:15443: āsīt ko'pi purākalpe kālo nāma mahādvijaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15444: sa gatvā puṣkare tīrthe japaṃ cakre divāniśam // SoKss_8,2.83 //
GK21sokss_pu:15446: tato 'sya śiraso 'cchinnam arcir āvir abhūn mahat // SoKss_8,2.84 //
GK21sokss_pu:15448: siddhādīnāṃ niruddhābhūj jajvāla ca jagattrayam // SoKss_8,2.85 //
GK21sokss_pu:15449: brahman yas te varo 'bhīṣṭas taṃ gṛhāṇa jvalanty amī /
GK21sokss_pu:15450: lokās tvadarciṣety ūcur brahmendrādyā upetya tam // SoKss_8,2.86 //
GK21sokss_pu:15451: japād anyatra mā bhūn me ratir ity eṣa eva me /
GK21sokss_pu:15452: varo nānyad vṛṇe kiṃcid iti tān pratyuvāca saḥ // SoKss_8,2.87 //
GK21sokss_pu:15453: nirbandhaṃ teṣu kurvatsu tato gatvāpi dūrataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15454: uttare himavatpārśve japann āsīt sa jāpakaḥ // SoKss_8,2.88 //
GK21sokss_pu:15455: tatrāpy asahyaṃ tattejaḥ saviśeṣaṃ kramād yadā /
GK21sokss_pu:15456: tadā vighnāya tasyendraḥ prajighāya surāṅganāḥ // SoKss_8,2.89 //
GK21sokss_pu:15457: sa dhīro lobhayantīs tā na tṛṇāyāpy amanyata /
GK21sokss_pu:15458: nisṛṣṭārthaṃ tatas tasmai mṛtyuṃ visasṛjuḥ surāḥ // SoKss_8,2.90 //
GK21sokss_pu:15459: upetya sa tam āha sma brahman martyair iyac ciram /
GK21sokss_pu:15460: na jīvyate tad ātmānaṃ tyaja mā laṅghaya sthitim // SoKss_8,2.91 //
GK21sokss_pu:15461: tac chrutvā sa dvijo 'vādīd yadi pūrṇo mamāvadhiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15462: āyuṣas tan na kasmān māṃ nayase kiṃ pratīkṣase // SoKss_8,2.92 //
GK21sokss_pu:15463: svayaṃ ca nāham ātmānaṃ tyajeyaṃ pāśahasta re /
GK21sokss_pu:15464: ātmaghātī bhaveyaṃ ca śarīraṃ kāmatas tyajan // SoKss_8,2.93 //
GK21sokss_pu:15465: ity uktavantaṃ taṃ netuṃ prabhāvān nāśakad yadā /
GK21sokss_pu:15466: tadā parāṅmukho mṛtyur jagāma sa yathāgatam // SoKss_8,2.94 //
GK21sokss_pu:15467: tato vijitakālaṃ taṃ kālaṃ sānuśayo dvijam /
GK21sokss_pu:15468: balād utkṣipya bāhubhyāṃ nināyendraḥ surālayam // SoKss_8,2.95 //
GK21sokss_pu:15469: tatra tadbhogavimukho japād aviramaṃś ca saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15470: devāvatārito bhūyas tam evāgād dhimālayam // SoKss_8,2.96 //
GK21sokss_pu:15472: yāvat tāvan nṛpas tena mārgeṇekṣvākur āyayau // SoKss_8,2.97 //
GK21sokss_pu:15473: sa tad buddhvā yathāvastu jāpakaṃ tam abhāṣata /
GK21sokss_pu:15474: devebhyaś cen na gṛhṇāsi varaṃ matto gṛhāṇa bhoḥ // SoKss_8,2.98 //
GK21sokss_pu:15475: tac chrutvā sa vihasyainaṃ jāpako 'bhyavadan nṛpam /
GK21sokss_pu:15476: tvaṃ śakto varadāne me tridaśebhyo 'py agṛhṇataḥ // SoKss_8,2.99 //
GK21sokss_pu:15477: ity ūcivāṃsaṃ taṃ vipram ikṣvākuḥ pratyuvāca saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15478: śakto na te 'haṃ śaktas tvaṃ mama tad dehi me varam // SoKss_8,2.100 //
GK21sokss_pu:15479: tataḥ sa jāpako 'vādīd yat te 'bhīṣṭaṃ vṛṇīṣva tat /
GK21sokss_pu:15480: dāsyāmy eveti tac chrutvā rājāntar vimamarśa saḥ // SoKss_8,2.101 //
GK21sokss_pu:15481: ahaṃ dadāmi vipro 'yaṃ gṛhṇātīty ucito vidhiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15482: viparītam idaṃ gṛhṇāmy aham eṣa dadāti yat // SoKss_8,2.102 //
GK21sokss_pu:15483: iti yāvat sa nṛpatir vicikitsan vilambate /
GK21sokss_pu:15484: tāvad vivadamānau dvau tatra viprāv upeyatuḥ // SoKss_8,2.103 //
GK21sokss_pu:15485: tau taṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpaṃ tasya puro nyāyārtham ūcatuḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15486: eko 'bravīt pradattā me gaur anena sadakṣiṇā // SoKss_8,2.104 //
GK21sokss_pu:15487: tāṃ me pratidadānasya hastād gṛhṇāty asau na kim /
GK21sokss_pu:15489: na cārthitā me tat kasmād grāhayaty eṣa māṃ balāt /
GK21sokss_pu:15490: etac chrutvā nṛpo 'vādīd ākṣeptāyaṃ na śudhyati // SoKss_8,2.106 //
GK21sokss_pu:15491: pratigṛhya kathaṃ dātre balāt pratidadāti gām /
GK21sokss_pu:15492: ity uktavantaṃ taṃ bhūpaṃ śakro labdhāntaro 'bravīt // SoKss_8,2.107 //
GK21sokss_pu:15493: rājañ jānāsi ced evaṃ nyāyyaṃ taj jāpakād dvijāt /
GK21sokss_pu:15494: varam abhyarthya saṃprāptaṃ kasmād gṛhṇāsi nāmutaḥ // SoKss_8,2.108 //
GK21sokss_pu:15495: tato niruttaro rājā jāpakaṃ taṃ jagāda saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15496: bhagavan svajapasyārdhāt phalaṃ vitara me varam // SoKss_8,2.109 //
GK21sokss_pu:15497: bāḍham evaṃ japasyārdhān madīyasyāstu te phalam /
GK21sokss_pu:15498: iti tasmai tato rājñe jāpakaḥ sa varaṃ dadau // SoKss_8,2.110 //
GK21sokss_pu:15499: sarvalokagatiṃ lebhe tena rājā sa so 'pi ca /
GK21sokss_pu:15500: jāpakaḥ saśivākhyānaṃ devānāṃ lokam āptavān // SoKss_8,2.111 //
GK21sokss_pu:15501: tatra sthitvā bahūn kalpān punar āgatya bhūtale /
GK21sokss_pu:15502: prāpya svatantratāṃ yogāt siddhiṃ lebhe ca śāśvatīm // SoKss_8,2.112 //
GK21sokss_pu:15504: sā tvayāptā svatantras tad rājan svaṃ deham āviśa // SoKss_8,2.113 //
GK21sokss_pu:15505: ity uktaḥ prattayogena mayena mumude param /
GK21sokss_pu:15507: tato dvitīyaṃ pātālaṃ nītvā tena mayena saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15508: prāveśyata gṛhaṃ divyaṃ putrādisahito nṛpaḥ // SoKss_8,2.115 //
GK21sokss_pu:15509: tatrāntar dadṛśus te ca sarve suptam iva sthitam /
GK21sokss_pu:15510: mahāntam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ patitaṃ śayanottame // SoKss_8,2.116 //
GK21sokss_pu:15513: so 'yam atra svadehas te pūrvabhāryāvṛtaḥ sthitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15514: praviśaitam iti smāha tataś candraprabhaṃ mayaḥ // SoKss_8,2.118 //
GK21sokss_pu:15515: so 'tha tenopadiṣṭaṃ taṃ yogam āsthāya bhūpatiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15517: tataḥ sa jṛmbhikāṃ kṛtvā śanair unmīlya locane /
GK21sokss_pu:15519: diṣṭyā devaḥ sunītho 'dya pratyujjīvita eṣa naḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15524: dṛṣṭvā mayaṃ vavande sa pitaraṃ pādayoḥ patan // SoKss_8,2.123 //
GK21sokss_pu:15525: sa pitāpi tam āliṅgya pṛṣṭavān sarvasaṃnidhau /
GK21sokss_pu:15526: kaccit smarasi putra dve janmanī tvaṃ hi saṃprati // SoKss_8,2.124 //
GK21sokss_pu:15528: sunīthajanmani ca yat tasya vṛttaṃ tad uktavān // SoKss_8,2.125 //
GK21sokss_pu:15530: ekaikam āśvāsitavān pūrvabhāryāś ca dānavīḥ // SoKss_8,2.126 //
GK21sokss_pu:15532: bhavej jātūpayogīti sthāpayām āsa rakṣitam // SoKss_8,2.127 //
GK21sokss_pu:15535: mayāsuro 'tha sarvāṃs tān harṣān nītvā purāt tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15536: anyat praveśayām āsa hemaratnacitaṃ puram // SoKss_8,2.129 //
GK21sokss_pu:15537: praviṣṭās tatra vaidūryavāpīṃ te dadṛśur bhṛtām /
GK21sokss_pu:15538: sudhārasena tasyāś ca tīre sarve 'py upāviśan // SoKss_8,2.130 //
GK21sokss_pu:15539: papuś ca tatsudhāpānam amṛtādhikam atra te /
GK21sokss_pu:15541: tena pānena te sarve mattasuptotthitās tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15544: putraihi yāmaḥ paśya svaṃ mātaraṃ sucirād iti // SoKss_8,2.133 //
GK21sokss_pu:15546: yayau caturthaṃ pātālaṃ saha sūryaprabhādibhiḥ // SoKss_8,2.134 //
GK21sokss_pu:15548: purāṇy ekaṃ puraṃ prāpuḥ sarve sarvahiraṇmayam // SoKss_8,2.135 //
GK21sokss_pu:15550: dadṛśur mayabhāryāṃ tāṃ te sunīthasya mātaram // SoKss_8,2.136 //
GK21sokss_pu:15553: sā dṛṣṭvaiva sunīthaṃ tam udatiṣṭhat sasaṃbhramam /
GK21sokss_pu:15554: sunītho 'py apatat tasyā abhivādyaiva pādayoḥ // SoKss_8,2.138 //
GK21sokss_pu:15555: tataḥ sā taṃ ciraspṛṣṭam āśliṣyodaśrur ātmajam /
GK21sokss_pu:15556: punas tatprāptihetuṃ taṃ praśasaṃsa mayaṃ patim // SoKss_8,2.139 //
GK21sokss_pu:15557: athābravīn mayo devi sumuṇḍīko 'paraḥ sa te /
GK21sokss_pu:15558: putraḥ putro 'sya putrasya jātaḥ sūryaprabho 'py ayam // SoKss_8,2.140 //
GK21sokss_pu:15560: etenaiva śarīreṇa bhāvī devi vinirmitaḥ // SoKss_8,2.141 //
GK21sokss_pu:15562: sūryaprabhaḥ papātaitya pādayoḥ sacivaiḥ saha // SoKss_8,2.142 //
GK21sokss_pu:15564: iti līlāvatī dattvā cāśiṣaṃ tam abhāṣata // SoKss_8,2.143 //
GK21sokss_pu:15566: vibhīṣaṇaṃ ca sasmāra smṛtāv ājagmatuś ca tau // SoKss_8,2.144 //
GK21sokss_pu:15568: karoṣi yadi me vākyaṃ dānavendra vadāmi tat // SoKss_8,2.145 //
GK21sokss_pu:15570: devaiḥ saha na te kāryā tad akāraṇavairitā // SoKss_8,2.146 //
GK21sokss_pu:15571: tadvirodhe hi nāpāyād ṛte kaścid guṇo 'sti vaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15572: nihatā hi suraiḥ saṃkhyeṣv asurā nāsuraiḥ surāḥ // SoKss_8,2.147 //
GK21sokss_pu:15573: tac chrutvā taṃ mayo 'vocan na balāt kurmahe vayam /
GK21sokss_pu:15574: haṭhāt kurvati śakre tu kathaṃ brūhi sahāmahe // SoKss_8,2.148 //
GK21sokss_pu:15575: ye cāsurā hatā devais te babhūvuḥ pramādinaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15576: apramattās tu kiṃ naiva baliprabhṛtayo hatāḥ // SoKss_8,2.149 //
GK21sokss_pu:15578: rakṣasendras tam āmantrya jagāma vasatiṃ nijām // SoKss_8,2.150 //
GK21sokss_pu:15580: ninye tṛtīyaṃ pātālaṃ baliṃ rājānam īkṣitum // SoKss_8,2.151 //
GK21sokss_pu:15581: svargād apy adhike tatra sarve te dadṛśur balim /
GK21sokss_pu:15583: nipetuḥ pādayos tasya sunīthādyāḥ krameṇa te /
GK21sokss_pu:15584: so 'pi tān mānayām āsa satkāreṇa yathocitam // SoKss_8,2.153 //
GK21sokss_pu:15586: prahlādam ānāyitavāñ śīghram anyāṃś ca dānavān // SoKss_8,2.154 //
GK21sokss_pu:15587: tān apy atra sunīthādyāḥ pādayos te vavandire /
GK21sokss_pu:15588: te cāpy abhinanandus tān prahvān ānandanirbharāḥ // SoKss_8,2.155 //
GK21sokss_pu:15589: athātra balir āha sma bhūtvā candraprabho bhuvi /
GK21sokss_pu:15590: sunīthaḥ svatanuprāptyā pratyujjīvita eṣa naḥ // SoKss_8,2.156 //
GK21sokss_pu:15592: śarveṇa cāyam ādiṣṭo bhāvī vidyādhareśvaraḥ // SoKss_8,2.157 //
GK21sokss_pu:15594: tad etābhyām avāptābhyāṃ dhruvam abhyudayo 'sti naḥ // SoKss_8,2.158 //
GK21sokss_pu:15595: etad balivacaḥ śrutvā śukraḥ provāca tadguruḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15596: dharmeṇa caratāṃ satye nāsty anabhyudayaḥ kva cit // SoKss_8,2.159 //
GK21sokss_pu:15598: tac chrutvā dānavās tatra tatheti niyamaṃ vyadhuḥ // SoKss_8,2.160 //
GK21sokss_pu:15601: atrāntare ca tatrāgāt sa punar nārado muniḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15602: gṛhītārghopaviṣṭaś ca dānavāṃs tān uvāca saḥ // SoKss_8,2.162 //
GK21sokss_pu:15603: preṣito 'ham ihendreṇa sa caivaṃ vakti vaḥ kila /
GK21sokss_pu:15605: tad idānīṃ na kāryaṃ naḥ punar vairam akāraṇam /
GK21sokss_pu:15607: evam uktendravākyaṃ taṃ prahlādo munim abravīt /
GK21sokss_pu:15608: sunīthajīvitāt tuṣṭir indrasyeti kim anyathā // SoKss_8,2.165 //
GK21sokss_pu:15609: akāraṇavirodhaṃ ca vayaṃ tāvan na kurmahe /
GK21sokss_pu:15610: adyaiva niyamo 'smābhiḥ kṛtaḥ sarvair guroḥ puraḥ // SoKss_8,2.166 //
GK21sokss_pu:15611: śrutaśarmā sapakṣatvam āśritya sa balād yadi /
GK21sokss_pu:15612: asmadviruddhaṃ kurute kāsmākaṃ tatra vācyatā // SoKss_8,2.167 //
GK21sokss_pu:15614: prāg eva hy ayam ādiṣṭaḥ sa pūrvārādhito 'sya yat // SoKss_8,2.168 //
GK21sokss_pu:15615: tad asminn īśvarādiṣṭe kārye kiṃ kurmahe vayam /
GK21sokss_pu:15616: tan niṣkāraṇam evaitac chakro vakty asamañjasam // SoKss_8,2.169 //
GK21sokss_pu:15617: ity ukto dānavendreṇa prahlādena sa nāradaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15618: tatheti vāsavaṃ nindann adarśanam agān muniḥ // SoKss_8,2.170 //
GK21sokss_pu:15619: tasmin gate dānavendrān uśanās tān abhāṣata /
GK21sokss_pu:15620: vairānubandhaḥ kārye 'smiṃs tāvad indrasya dṛśyate // SoKss_8,2.171 //
GK21sokss_pu:15622: kā tasya śaktiḥ kiṃ kuryād āsthā vā tasya vaiṣṇavī // SoKss_8,2.172 //
GK21sokss_pu:15623: iti śukravacaḥ śrutvā dānavās te 'numanya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:15624: sahaprahlādam āmantrya baliṃ jagmur nijālayān // SoKss_8,2.173 //
GK21sokss_pu:15625: tataś caturthaṃ pātālaṃ prahlāde svālayaṃ gate /
GK21sokss_pu:15626: utthāya sadaso rājā viveśābhyantaraṃ baliḥ // SoKss_8,2.174 //
GK21sokss_pu:15627: mayaḥ sunīthaś cānye ca sarve sūryaprabhādayaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15628: praṇamya balim ājagmus tad eva svaṃ niketanam // SoKss_8,2.175 //
GK21sokss_pu:15630: līlāvatī sunīthaṃ taṃ jagāda jananī nijā // SoKss_8,2.176 //
GK21sokss_pu:15631: putra jānāsi yad imā bhāryās te mahatāṃ sutāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15635: prabhāsasya vasor etāṃ vetsi kīrtimatīṃ sutām // SoKss_8,2.178 //
GK21sokss_pu:15636: tisras tad etā draṣṭavyāḥ samadṛṣṭyā suta tvayā /
GK21sokss_pu:15637: ity uktvā mukhyabhāryās tās tisro 'smai sā samarpayat // SoKss_8,2.179 //

GK21sokss_pu:15641: ratakrīḍāsukhaṃ tat tat prāg bhuktam api nūtanam // SoKss_8,2.181 //
GK21sokss_pu:15643: niśi tasyām apatnīko nyaṣīdac chayanīyake // SoKss_8,2.182 //

GK21sokss_pu:15647: anye tu paritaḥ sūryaprabhaṃ nidrāṃ yayuḥ sukham // SoKss_8,2.184 //

GK21sokss_pu:15651: ity utpādyāpi vidhinā pātāle sthāpitām iva // SoKss_8,2.186 //
GK21sokss_pu:15652: sūryaprabhaś ca keyaṃ syād iti yāvad vimarśati /

GK21sokss_pu:15655: dṛṣṭvā sūryaprabhaṃ sā tam upāgān madhyaśāyinam // SoKss_8,2.188 //
GK21sokss_pu:15656: uvāca ca sakhīṃ so 'yaṃ sakhi tat spṛśa pādayoḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:15661: vīkṣya covāca kanye te ke yuvāṃ kim ihāgamaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15662: bhavatyor iti tac chrutvā tatsakhī tam abhāṣata // SoKss_8,2.191 //
GK21sokss_pu:15664: amīla iti daityendro hiraṇyākṣasuto balī // SoKss_8,2.192 //
GK21sokss_pu:15666: sa ito 'dya baleḥ pārśvād āgatyaitat pitābravīt // SoKss_8,2.193 //
GK21sokss_pu:15667: diṣṭyādya jīvitaṃ prāptaḥ sunīthaḥ punar īkṣitaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:15670: tad ihānandasaṃmānaṃ sunīthasya karomy aham // SoKss_8,2.195 //
GK21sokss_pu:15672: sunīthasyaikagotratvād dātuṃ caiṣā na yujyate // SoKss_8,2.196 //
GK21sokss_pu:15674: tatsutasya ca saṃmānaḥ kṛtas tasya kṛto bhavet // SoKss_8,2.197 //
GK21sokss_pu:15677: evaṃ tayokte tatsakhyā nidrāti sma mṛṣaiva saḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:15681: prahastaś cāpy upāgatya deva jāgarṣi kiṃ na vā /
GK21sokss_pu:15682: iti sūryaprabhaṃ smāha sa conmiṣya tam abhyadhāt // SoKss_8,2.201 //
GK21sokss_pu:15683: sakhe jāgarmi nidrā hi mamādyaikākinaḥ kutaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15684: viśeṣaṃ tu vadāmy evaṃ śṛṇu gopyaṃ hi kiṃ tvayi // SoKss_8,2.202 //

GK21sokss_pu:15687: kṣaṇena ca gatā kvāpi hṛtvaiva mama mānasam /

GK21sokss_pu:15690: dṛṣṭvātra tāṃ samaṃ sakhyā sthitāṃ kanyām abhāṣata // SoKss_8,2.205 //
GK21sokss_pu:15692: tat tvaṃ maduparodhena punar dehy asya darśanam // SoKss_8,2.206 //
GK21sokss_pu:15695: prabuddhena hy anenāham uktaḥ kṛtvā bhavatkathām /
GK21sokss_pu:15696: kuto 'pi darśayānīya tāṃ me prāṇimi nānyathā // SoKss_8,2.208 //
GK21sokss_pu:15697: tato 'haṃ tvām upāyātas tad ehy ālokaya svayam /
GK21sokss_pu:15698: iti prahastenoktā sā kanyāsulabhayā hriyā // SoKss_8,2.209 //
GK21sokss_pu:15699: prasahya nāśakad gantuṃ vimṛśantī yadā tadā /
GK21sokss_pu:15700: haste gṛhītvā nītābhūt tena sūryaprabhāntikam // SoKss_8,2.210 //
GK21sokss_pu:15701: sūryaprabhaś ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā pārśvāyātāṃ kalāvatīm /
GK21sokss_pu:15702: uvāca caṇḍi yuktaṃ te kim etad yad ihādya me // SoKss_8,2.211 //
GK21sokss_pu:15703: tvayā suptasya cauryeṇa praviśya hṛdayaṃ hṛtam /

GK21sokss_pu:15705: etac chrutvā vidagdhā sā tatsakhī vyājahāra tam /

GK21sokss_pu:15707: niścitārpayituṃ yasmāt tasmāt kas te niṣedhakaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:15711: tataḥ prahasto 'vādīt tāṃ mā vikalpo 'stu devi te /

GK21sokss_pu:15713: ity uktvaiva samaṃ sarvaiḥ prahaste nirgate bahiḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:15717: rātryante ca kalāvatyāṃ gatāyāṃ vasatiṃ nijām /

GK21sokss_pu:15720: sa tān yathārhaṃ saṃmānya sabhāstho mayam abravīt // SoKss_8,2.220 //
GK21sokss_pu:15722: tad adya yāvat sarve 'pi vayam ekatra bhuñjmahe // SoKss_8,2.221 //
GK21sokss_pu:15723: evaṃ kurmo 'tra ko doṣa ity ukte ca mayena saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15725: āyayuś cātra sarvebhyaḥ pātālebhyaḥ krameṇa te /
GK21sokss_pu:15726: pūrvam āgād balī rājā sahāsaṃkhyair mahāsuraiḥ // SoKss_8,2.223 //
GK21sokss_pu:15728: sumāyas tantukacchaś ca vikaṭākṣaḥ prakampanaḥ // SoKss_8,2.224 //
GK21sokss_pu:15732: yathākramopaviṣṭāṃś ca prahlādas tān amānayat // SoKss_8,2.226 //
GK21sokss_pu:15733: prāpte cāhārakāle te sarve saha mayādibhiḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:15741: divyam annaṃ bubhujire papuḥ pānam athottamam // SoKss_8,2.230 //
GK21sokss_pu:15742: bhuktapītāś ca gatvānyat sarve ratnamayaṃ sadaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:15746: dyotayantīṃ diśaḥ kāntyā varṣantīm amṛtaṃ dṛśoḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:15747: kautukād iva pātālam āgatāṃ mūrtim aindavīm // SoKss_8,2.233 //
GK21sokss_pu:15749: smeradṛṣṭiṃ vidhātraiva sṛṣṭāṃ nṛttamayīm iva // SoKss_8,2.234 //

GK21sokss_pu:15753: api svīkṛtam anyābhir jahāra hṛdayaṃ haṭhāt // SoKss_8,2.236 //
GK21sokss_pu:15754: tataḥ sāpy asurendrāṇāṃ madhye dūrād dadarśa tam /

GK21sokss_pu:15759: sabhāsthāś ca tayor bhāvaṃ taṃ dvayor apy alakṣayan /

GK21sokss_pu:15772: nirgacchāmīti sa ca tāṃ parijñāyotthito 'bhyadhāt // SoKss_8,2.245 //

GK21sokss_pu:15780: prabodhya svairam ācakhyāv āgatāṃ tāṃ mahallikām // SoKss_8,2.249 //

GK21sokss_pu:15783: nītaḥ kṛtārthatāṃ tāvad ayam abhyāgato janaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:15789: tathāpi tāval lolākṣi dṛṣṭamātreṇa me tava /

GK21sokss_pu:15808: sakopā ca salajjā ca sabhayā ca babhūva sā // SoKss_8,2.263 //
GK21sokss_pu:15810: sūryaprabhaś ca niḥspandas tasthāv ālikhito yathā // SoKss_8,2.264 //
GK21sokss_pu:15811: dṛṣṭā kathaṃ palāye 'haṃ jihremīrṣyāmi vā yadi /
GK21sokss_pu:15812: iti tatpārśvam evāgāt kalāvaty api sā tataḥ // SoKss_8,2.265 //
GK21sokss_pu:15813: kuśalaṃ sakhi kutra tvam āgataivam ito niśi /

GK21sokss_pu:15815: tato mahallikāvocan mamaitad gṛham atra tu /

GK21sokss_pu:15817: tac chrutvā sā vihasyaitāṃ kalāvaty evam abravīt /

GK21sokss_pu:15820: evam ukte kalāvatyā sā jagāda mahallikā // SoKss_8,2.269 //
GK21sokss_pu:15821: yadi prītyā mayoktā tvaṃ tat kiṃ sadveṣaniṣṭhuram /
GK21sokss_pu:15822: evaṃ vadasi nirlajje kim ahaṃ sadṛśī tava // SoKss_8,2.270 //
GK21sokss_pu:15823: kim ahaṃ bāndhavādattā dūrād etya parasthale /

GK21sokss_pu:15825: ahaṃ pituḥ prāghuṇikaṃ svasthāne draṣṭum āgatā /

GK21sokss_pu:15833: sūryaprabhaś ca vimanā yuktaṃ yad abhavat tadā /
GK21sokss_pu:15834: kāntābhyāṃ hi samaṃ tasya tadāsaktaṃ mano gatam // SoKss_8,2.276 //
GK21sokss_pu:15836: prāhiṇod drutam utthāpya prabhāsaṃ sa svamantriṇam // SoKss_8,2.277 //
GK21sokss_pu:15837: mahallikāyās tadvac ca prahastaṃ sa visṛṣṭavān /

GK21sokss_pu:15843: bahis tatra dvayoś ceṭyor ālāpaś ca śruto mayā /
