GK21sokss_pu:21028: ity uktvā tau viramyobhau rudantaṃ māmavocatām /
GK21sokss_pu:21029: mā rodīrekamevāstu māsaṃ pīḍā tavedṛśī // SoKss_9,6.152 //
GK21sokss_pu:21031: niśi svapna ivādrākṣaṃ bhīmaṃ puruṣamāgatam // SoKss_9,6.153 //
GK21sokss_pu:21033: kṣipto nyastaṃ ca me mūrdhni jvalaccakramidaṃ bhramat // SoKss_9,6.154 //
GK21sokss_pu:21034: iti me pitṛśāpo 'yaṃ tena prāṇa na yānti me /
GK21sokss_pu:21035: sa ca māso 'dya saṃpūrṇo na ca mucye tathāpy aham // SoKss_9,6.155 //
GK21sokss_pu:21036: ity uktavantaṃ taṃ khaḍgaṃ sa cakraḥ sakṛpo 'bravīt /
GK21sokss_pu:21037: pitroḥ pravasatārthārthaṃ mayāpi na kṛtaṃ vacaḥ // SoKss_9,6.156 //
GK21sokss_pu:21038: prāptaṃ naṅkṣyati te vittamiti māṃ śapataḥ sma tau /
GK21sokss_pu:21039: tenābdhau me dhanaṃ naṣṭaṃ kṛtsnaṃ dvīpāntarārjitam // SoKss_9,6.157 //
GK21sokss_pu:21040: eṣaiva vārtā cānyatra tatko 'rtho jīvitena me /
GK21sokss_pu:21041: dehyetanmūrdhni me cakraṃ khaḍga śāpo 'payātu te // SoKss_9,6.158 //
GK21sokss_pu:21042: iti cakre vadaty eva vāṇī divyātra śuśruve /
GK21sokss_pu:21043: khaḍga mukto 'si cakrasya mūrdhny etac cakramarpaya // SoKss_9,6.159 //
GK21sokss_pu:21045: khaḍgaḥ kenāpyadṛśyena ninye pitṛhṛhaṃ tataḥ // SoKss_9,6.160 //
GK21sokss_pu:21047: cakrastvādāya tanmūrdhni cakraṃ tatraivam abhyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.161 //
GK21sokss_pu:21049: ā papakṣayametanme cakraṃ bhrāmyatu mūrdhani // SoKss_9,6.162 //
GK21sokss_pu:21050: ity uktavantaṃ taṃ cakraṃ dhīrasattvaṃ nabhaḥsthitāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21053: pāpaṃ te vraja vittaṃ ca tavākṣayyaṃ bhaviṣyati // SoKss_9,6.164 //
GK21sokss_pu:21054: ity uktavatsu deveṣu cakrasya śirasaḥ kṣaṇāt /
GK21sokss_pu:21055: āyasaṃ tasya taccakraṃ jagāma kvāpy adarśanam // SoKss_9,6.165 //
GK21sokss_pu:21058: aṅke kṛtvaiva taṃ cakraṃ nagaraṃ dhavalābhidham /
GK21sokss_pu:21059: nijaṃ tatprāpayām āsa jagāma ca yathāgatam // SoKss_9,6.167 //
GK21sokss_pu:21064: kāmadhenus tu tadbhaktis tatrāpyetāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu /
GK21sokss_pu:21065: āsīt ko'pi muniḥ pūrvaṃ vanacārī mahātapāḥ // SoKss_9,6.170 //
GK21sokss_pu:21067: viṣṭhā kadācin muktābhūt so 'tha kruddho dadarśa tām // SoKss_9,6.171 //
GK21sokss_pu:21068: dṛṣṭam atraiva sā tena balākā bhasmasādabhūt /
GK21sokss_pu:21069: tapaḥ prabhāvāhaṃkāraṃ sa ca bheje tato muniḥ // SoKss_9,6.172 //
GK21sokss_pu:21070: ekadā nagare kvāpi sa brāhmaṇagṛhaṃ muniḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21071: ekaṃ praviśya gṛhiṇīṃ tatra bhikṣāmayācata // SoKss_9,6.173 //
GK21sokss_pu:21073: iti taṃ sā ca gṛhiṇī nijagāda pativratā // SoKss_9,6.174 //
GK21sokss_pu:21074: tatas taṃ kruddhayā dṛṣṭyā vīkṣamāṇaṃ vihasya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:21075: abhāṣata mune nāhaṃ balākā mṛṣyatām iti // SoKss_9,6.175 //
GK21sokss_pu:21079: sādhvī bhikṣāṃ samādāya tasyāgādantikaṃ muneḥ // SoKss_9,6.177 //
GK21sokss_pu:21081: kathaṃ balākāvṛttāntaḥ parokṣo 'pi mama tvayā // SoKss_9,6.178 //
GK21sokss_pu:21082: jñāta ityādito brūhi bhikṣāṃ gṛhṇāmyahaṃ tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21084: na bhartṛbhakter aparaṃ dharmaṃ kaṃcana vedmy aham /
GK21sokss_pu:21087: gatvā paśya tataḥ śreyo nirahaṃkāramāpsyasi // SoKss_9,6.181 //
GK21sokss_pu:21088: evaṃ sarvavidā proktaḥ sa pativratayā muniḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21092: dharmavyādhaś ca dṛṣṭvaiva sa taṃ munim abhāṣata /
GK21sokss_pu:21093: kiṃ pativratayā brahmanniha tvaṃ preṣitastayā // SoKss_9,6.184 //
GK21sokss_pu:21095: īdṛśaṃ te kathaṃ jñānaṃ māṃsavikrayiṇaḥ sataḥ // SoKss_9,6.185 //
GK21sokss_pu:21096: ity uktavantaṃ tamṛṣiṃ dharmavyādho jagāda saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21099: śaye śayitayostena jñānam īdṛgvidhaṃ mama // SoKss_9,6.187 //
GK21sokss_pu:21103: naiva kurvo mune tena nirbādhajñānamāvayoḥ // SoKss_9,6.189 //
GK21sokss_pu:21104: tasmāttvam apy ahaṃkāraṃ muktvā śuddhyai munivrataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21105: svadharmaṃ cara yenāśu paraṃ jyotiravāpsyasi // SoKss_9,6.190 //
GK21sokss_pu:21107: gatvā dṛṣṭvā ca taccaryāṃ munistuṣṭo vanaṃ yayau // SoKss_9,6.191 //
GK21sokss_pu:21110: eṣa prabhāvo bhaktānāṃ patyau pitari mātari /
GK21sokss_pu:21111: tadehi saṃbhāvaya tāṃ mātaraṃ darśanotsukām // SoKss_9,6.193 //
GK21sokss_pu:21115: tenāttabhāraḥ sa tataḥ prāyātpitṛsakho niśi // SoKss_9,6.195 //
GK21sokss_pu:21116: kramātprāpya svadeśaṃ ca jananīṃ darśanena tām /
GK21sokss_pu:21119: tatra mātṛyutaḥ pitrā vṛttāntākhyāyinā saha // SoKss_9,6.197 //
GK21sokss_pu:21121: niśākṣaye bandhumatī sāntaḥ suptā vyabudhyata // SoKss_9,6.198 //
GK21sokss_pu:21122: buddhvā ca taṃ patiṃ kvāpi gataṃ virahaviklavā /
GK21sokss_pu:21123: na lebhe sā ratiṃ kvāpi prāsādopavanādiṣu // SoKss_9,6.199 //
GK21sokss_pu:21126: yāmi kāryeṇa kenāpi śīghrameṣyāmi ceti me /
GK21sokss_pu:21127: svair amuktvaiva sa gatastanmā putri śucaṃ kṛthāḥ // SoKss_9,6.201 //
GK21sokss_pu:21131: pūjayantī sadaivāsīd dānaiḥ sā dvijapuṃgavān // SoKss_9,6.203 //
GK21sokss_pu:21135: kaś cittathāpi devyatra kāryā naivādhṛtistvayā // SoKss_9,6.205 //
GK21sokss_pu:21137: tathā ca yanmayā dṛṣṭamāścaryaṃ vacmi tacchṛṇu // SoKss_9,6.206 //
GK21sokss_pu:21140: tato 'kasmāc ca nirgatya khaḍgapāṇiḥ pumān gṛhāt /
GK21sokss_pu:21143: dūrāt sakautukaś cāhaṃ paśyan nāsamalakṣitaḥ // SoKss_9,6.209 //
GK21sokss_pu:21145: militāya ca tattasmai yathādṛṣṭaṃ mayoditam // SoKss_9,6.210 //
GK21sokss_pu:21149: tatra me suciraṃ sevāmekaḥ pāśupato vyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.212 //
GK21sokss_pu:21152: sa pṛṣṭaḥ kāraṇaṃ svair aṃ bilakhaḍgaprasādhane /
GK21sokss_pu:21153: sahāyaṃ prārthayata māṃ pratipannaṃ mayā ca tat // SoKss_9,6.214 //
GK21sokss_pu:21154: tato mayā sahāraṇyaṃ gatvā homādinā niśi /
GK21sokss_pu:21155: prakaṭīkṛtya vivaraṃ sa māṃ pāśupato 'bhyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.215 //
GK21sokss_pu:21156: vīra praviśa pūrvaṃ tvaṃ khaḍgaṃ prāpya ca māmapi /
GK21sokss_pu:21157: praveśayestvaṃ nirgatya samayaṃ cātra me kuru // SoKss_9,6.216 //
GK21sokss_pu:21158: ity uktastena tasyāhaṃ kṛtvā samayamāśu tat /
GK21sokss_pu:21159: praviśya vivaraṃ prāpamekaṃ ratnamayaṃ gṛham // SoKss_9,6.217 //
GK21sokss_pu:21161: antaḥ prāveśayatpremṇā prādāt khaḍgaṃ ca sātra me // SoKss_9,6.218 //
GK21sokss_pu:21163: rakṣerity uktavatyāhaṃ tayā tatrāvasaṃ saha // SoKss_9,6.219 //
GK21sokss_pu:21171: mām ādāyaiva niṣkālya vivarāt prākṣipadbahiḥ // SoKss_9,6.223 //
GK21sokss_pu:21176: iti yāvattribhuvanaḥ sa rājā devi vakti mām /
GK21sokss_pu:21179: sa rājā tena bhūyaś ca prabhāvaṃ divyamāptavān // SoKss_9,6.227 //
GK21sokss_pu:21183: prāptayā sa svayā sākaṃ siddhyaivāsurakanyayā // SoKss_9,6.229 //
GK21sokss_pu:21185: kṛtaghnāścirasiddhārthā api bhraśyanti hi dhruvam // SoKss_9,6.230 //
GK21sokss_pu:21189: iti tasmāddvijāc chrutvā toṣaṃ bandhumatī yayau // SoKss_9,6.232 //
GK21sokss_pu:21190: cakāra ca kṛtārthaṃ taṃ vipraṃ dattvā dhanaṃ bahu /
GK21sokss_pu:21194: na sa devi mayā dṛṣṭastvadbhartā kvāpi kiṃ tvaham /
GK21sokss_pu:21196: tadāsu saumanasyaṃ te bhāvītyākhyāti me manaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21198: tathā ca kathayāmyetāmatra devi kathāṃ śṛṇu /
GK21sokss_pu:21204: bhīmenāpi vicitya kṣmāṃ dadṛśe tena rājasu /
GK21sokss_pu:21205: na nalādaparo rājā tulyaḥ svaduhituḥ patiḥ // SoKss_9,6.240 //
GK21sokss_pu:21210: sa baddho divyahaṃsastām uvāca vyaktayā girā /
GK21sokss_pu:21211: rājaputryupakāraṃ te kariṣyāmi vimuñca mām // SoKss_9,6.243 //
GK21sokss_pu:21212: naiṣadho 'sti nalo nāma rājā hṛdi vahanti yam /
GK21sokss_pu:21213: sadguṇair gumphitaṃ hāram iva divyāṅganā api // SoKss_9,6.244 //
GK21sokss_pu:21214: tasya tvaṃ sadṛśī bhāryā bhartā sa sadṛśastava /
GK21sokss_pu:21215: tad atra tulyasaṃyoge kāmadūto bhavāmi vām // SoKss_9,6.245 //
GK21sokss_pu:21216: tac chrutvā divyahaṃsaṃ sā matvā satyābhibhāṣiṇam /
GK21sokss_pu:21217: mumoca damayantī tam evamastviti vādinī // SoKss_9,6.246 //
GK21sokss_pu:21218: na mayā varaṇīyo 'nyo nalāditi jagāda ca /
GK21sokss_pu:21220: sa ca haṃsastato gatvā niṣedhaṣvāśu śiśriye /
GK21sokss_pu:21222: nalaḥ sa rājā dṛṣṭvā taṃ rājahaṃsaṃ manoramam /
GK21sokss_pu:21225: iha tvadupakārārthamāgataḥ śṛṇu vacmi te // SoKss_9,6.250 //
GK21sokss_pu:21227: damayantīti duhitā spṛhaṇīyā surair api // SoKss_9,6.251 //
GK21sokss_pu:21229: tayā bhartā vṛtastac ca tavāhaṃ vaktumāgataḥ // SoKss_9,6.252 //
GK21sokss_pu:21231: viśikhaiś ca sa puṣpeṣornalaḥ samamavidhyata // SoKss_9,6.253 //
GK21sokss_pu:21232: abravītsa ca haṃsaṃ taṃ dhanyo 'haṃ vihagottama /
GK21sokss_pu:21234: ity uktvā tena muktaḥ sa haṃso gatvā śaśaṃsa tat /
GK21sokss_pu:21235: damayantyai yathāvastu yathākāmaṃ jagāma ca // SoKss_9,6.255 //
GK21sokss_pu:21236: damayantī ca sotkaṇṭhā yuktyā mātṛmukhena sā /
GK21sokss_pu:21237: pituḥ svātprārthayām āsa nalaprāptyai svayaṃvaram // SoKss_9,6.256 //
GK21sokss_pu:21238: anumanya sa tasyāś ca svayaṃvarakṛte pitā /
GK21sokss_pu:21239: bhīmaḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ dūtānvisṛṣṭavān // SoKss_9,6.257 //
GK21sokss_pu:21240: prāptadūtāś ca nikhilā vidarbhān prati bhūmipāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21241: vrajanti sma nalo 'py utko rathārūḍhaś cacāla saḥ // SoKss_9,6.258 //
GK21sokss_pu:21245: saṃmantrya damayanty uktvā nalasyaivāntikaṃ yayuḥ // SoKss_9,6.260 //
GK21sokss_pu:21246: ūcuś ca prāpya taṃ prahvaṃ vidarbhān prasthitaṃ pathi /
GK21sokss_pu:21247: gatvāsmadvacanād brūhi damayantīm idaṃ nṛpa // SoKss_9,6.261 //
GK21sokss_pu:21248: pañcānāṃ varayaikaṃ naḥ kiṃ martyena nalena te /
GK21sokss_pu:21251: tathetyetāṃ ca devājñāṃ pratipede nalo 'tha saḥ // SoKss_9,6.263 //
GK21sokss_pu:21252: gatvā cāntaḥpuraṃ tasyāḥ praviśyādṛṣṭa eva ca /
GK21sokss_pu:21253: damayantyāḥ śaśaṃsaiva devādeśaṃ tathaiva tam // SoKss_9,6.264 //
GK21sokss_pu:21254: sā taṃ śrutvābravītsādhvī devāste santu tādṛśāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21255: tathāpi me nalo bhartā na kāryaṃ tridaśair mama // SoKss_9,6.265 //
GK21sokss_pu:21257: nalo gatvā tathaivaitadindrādibhyaḥ śaśaṃsa saḥ // SoKss_9,6.266 //
GK21sokss_pu:21259: tathyavādinniti ca te tuṣṭāstasmai dudurvarān // SoKss_9,6.267 //
GK21sokss_pu:21263: svayaṃvare prastute te nalāntika upāviśan // SoKss_9,6.269 //
GK21sokss_pu:21264: athaitya damayantī sā bhrātrā svenaikaśo nṛpān /
GK21sokss_pu:21267: sā bhrātari samudbhrānte vyākulā samacintayat // SoKss_9,6.271 //
GK21sokss_pu:21268: nūnaṃ me lokapālaistair māyeyaṃ pañcabhiḥ kṛtā /
GK21sokss_pu:21269: ṣaṣṭhaṃ manye nalaṃ tvatra na cānyatrāsti me gatiḥ // SoKss_9,6.272 //
GK21sokss_pu:21272: bho lokapālāḥ svapne 'pi nalādanyatra cenna me /
GK21sokss_pu:21273: manastattena satyena svaṃ darśayata me vapuḥ // SoKss_9,6.274 //
GK21sokss_pu:21275: paradārāś ca sā teṣāṃ tatkathaṃ moha eṣa vaḥ // SoKss_9,6.275 //
GK21sokss_pu:21279: dṛśaṃ varaṇamālāṃ ca hṛṣṭā rājñi nale nyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.277 //
GK21sokss_pu:21281: vivāhamaṅgalaṃ bhīmaścakre tasya nalasya ca // SoKss_9,6.278 //
GK21sokss_pu:21283: nṛpā yathāgataṃ jagmurdevāḥ śakrādayaś ca te // SoKss_9,6.279 //
GK21sokss_pu:21285: buddhvā ca damayantyarthamāgatau tau ca te 'bruvan // SoKss_9,6.280 //
GK21sokss_pu:21286: na gantavyaṃ vidarbheṣu tata evāgatā vayam /
GK21sokss_pu:21287: vṛttaḥ svayaṃvaro rājā damayantyā nalo vṛtaḥ // SoKss_9,6.281 //
GK21sokss_pu:21288: tac chrutvaivocatuḥ pāpau tau kalidvāparau ruṣā /
GK21sokss_pu:21289: devān bhavādṛśāṃs tyaktvā yat sa martyo vṛtas tayā // SoKss_9,6.282 //
GK21sokss_pu:21291: evaṃ kṛtapratijñau tau nivartya yayatus tataḥ // SoKss_9,6.283 //
GK21sokss_pu:21293: damayantyā samaṃ vadhvā kṛtārtho niṣadhānagāt // SoKss_9,6.284 //
GK21sokss_pu:21295: śarvasya gaurī dehārdhaṃ tasya tvātmaiva sābhavat // SoKss_9,6.285 //
GK21sokss_pu:21297: prasūte sma tadanvekāmindrasenāṃ ca kanyakām // SoKss_9,6.286 //
GK21sokss_pu:21298: tāvac ca sa kaliś chidraṃ tasyānucchāstravartinaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21301: sa suṣvāpa nalaḥ pānamadena muṣitasmṛtiḥ // SoKss_9,6.288 //
GK21sokss_pu:21303: kalis tasya śarīrāntarnalasya praviveśa saḥ // SoKss_9,6.289 //
GK21sokss_pu:21304: tena dehapraviṣṭena kalinā sa nalo nṛpaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21307: asevata divā svapnaṃ sa jajāgara rātriṣu // SoKss_9,6.291 //
GK21sokss_pu:21309: avamānaṃ satāṃ cakre saṃmānamasatāṃ ca saḥ // SoKss_9,6.292 //
GK21sokss_pu:21311: chidraṃ prāpya śarīrāntaḥpraviṣṭo dvāparo vyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.293 //
GK21sokss_pu:21312: kadācit puṣkarākhyas ya gṛhe tasyānujasya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21313: nalo dadarśa dāntākhyaṃ sundaraṃ dhavalaṃ vṛṣam // SoKss_9,6.294 //
GK21sokss_pu:21314: lobhānmṛgayamānāya taṃ tasmai jyāyase na saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21316: jagāda taṃ ca yadyasti vāñchāsminvṛṣabhe tava /
GK21sokss_pu:21317: taddyūtena vijityainaṃ mattaḥ svīkuru mā ciram // SoKss_9,6.296 //
GK21sokss_pu:21318: tac chrutvā sa nalo mohātpratipede tatheti tat /
GK21sokss_pu:21319: tataḥ pravavṛte dyūtaṃ tayor bhātroḥ parasparam // SoKss_9,6.297 //
GK21sokss_pu:21320: puṣkarākhyas ya sa vṛṣo nalasyebhādayaḥ paṇaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21321: jigāya puṣkarākhyaś ca nalo muhurajīyata // SoKss_9,6.298 //
GK21sokss_pu:21322: dinair dvitrair bale koṣe hārite 'pi durodarāt /
GK21sokss_pu:21323: na nalo vāryamāṇo 'pi cacāla kaliviplutaḥ // SoKss_9,6.299 //
GK21sokss_pu:21324: tena matvā gataṃ rājyaṃ damayantī nijau śiśū /
GK21sokss_pu:21327: tataḥ sa puṣkarākhyena jagade jitakāśinā // SoKss_9,6.301 //
GK21sokss_pu:21329: damayantīmidānīṃ tvaṃ dyūte pratipaṇaṃ kuru // SoKss_9,6.302 //
GK21sokss_pu:21330: ity uktivātyayā tasya nalo 'nala iva jvalan /
GK21sokss_pu:21331: na cākāle 'bravītkiṃcinna ca cakre paṇakriyām // SoKss_9,6.303 //
GK21sokss_pu:21332: tataḥ sa puṣkarākhyas tamavādīnna karoṣi cet /
GK21sokss_pu:21333: bhāryāṃ paṇaṃ tadasmānme deśānniryāhi tatsakhaḥ // SoKss_9,6.304 //
GK21sokss_pu:21334: tac chrutvaiva nalo deśāddamayantyā samaṃ tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21337: tatrocyatāṃ kimanyeṣāṃ krimīṇām iva dehinām // SoKss_9,6.306 //
GK21sokss_pu:21340: atha bhrātṛhṛtaiśvaryo videśaṃ sa nalo brajan /
GK21sokss_pu:21341: damayantyā saha prāpa kṣudhāklānto vanāntaram // SoKss_9,6.308 //

GK21sokss_pu:24213: tataḥ sa rājñā kathitaḥ svayaṃ pṛṣṭo 'nubandhataḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:24216: kakudaṃ mama putrasya kubjasyābhyantaraṃ naya // SoKss_10,6.231 //

GK21sokss_pu:24219: evaṃ kṛtvā paṇaṃ tasmād gṛhītvā tān paṇān dvijāt /

GK21sokss_pu:24225: iti bhadramukhāt sa gomukhākhyāt sacivān mugdhakathāṃ niśamya rātrau /

GK21sokss_pu:24255: astaṃ gate ravau saṃdhyām upāsya prāṇināṃ bhayāt /

GK21sokss_pu:24258: udgacchanti sma puruṣā bahavaḥ paśyatostayoḥ // SoKss_10,7.14 //

GK21sokss_pu:24268: sarve parijanāstasyāṃ vāpyām eva mamajjire // SoKss_10,7.19 //
GK21sokss_pu:24272: te ca bhārye ubhe tasya paścimā vallabhā punaḥ // SoKss_10,7.21 //
GK21sokss_pu:24274: bhartuḥ sapatnyāś cāhāraṃ pānaṃ copānayat satī // SoKss_10,7.22 //
GK21sokss_pu:24275: tayor bhuktavatoḥ sāpi bubhuje so 'tha tatpatiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24276: paryaṅkaśayanaṃ bheje tayā sākaṃ dvitīyayā // SoKss_10,7.23 //
GK21sokss_pu:24278: ādyā ca bhāryā sā tasya pādasaṃvāhanaṃ vyadhāt // SoKss_10,7.24 //

GK21sokss_pu:24284: yaśodharaṃ tayostāvaddvitīyā sā dadarśa tam // SoKss_10,7.27 //
GK21sokss_pu:24286: tam upetya surūpaṃ sā māṃ bhajasvetyabhāṣata // SoKss_10,7.28 //
GK21sokss_pu:24287: pāpe tvaṃ paradārā me tavāhaṃ parapūruṣaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24289: tvādṛśānāṃ śatenāhaṃ saṃgatā kiṃ bhayaṃ tava /
GK21sokss_pu:24294: lakṣeṇa vā mama tvaṃ tu mātā nāhaṃ tathāvidhaḥ // SoKss_10,7.32 //
GK21sokss_pu:24295: evaṃ nirākṛtā tena sā prabodhya patiṃ krudhā /
GK21sokss_pu:24296: yaśodharaṃ taṃ saṃdarśya jagāda rudatī śaṭhā // SoKss_10,7.33 //
GK21sokss_pu:24297: anena pāpmanā supte tvayyahaṃ dhvaṃsitā balāt /
GK21sokss_pu:24298: tac chrutvaiva sa uttasthau khaḍgamākṛṣya tatpatiḥ // SoKss_10,7.34 //
GK21sokss_pu:24299: athānyā sā satī bhāryā taṃ gṛhītvaiva pādayoḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24300: abravīnmā kṛthā mithyā pāpaṃ śṛṇu vaco mama // SoKss_10,7.35 //
GK21sokss_pu:24303: mātā mama tvamity uktvā yadanena nirākṛtā /
GK21sokss_pu:24305: anayā matsamakṣaṃ ca rātriṣviha tarau sthitāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24310: na caiṣa me satīdharmo yadbhartaryanṛtaṃ vacaḥ // SoKss_10,7.40 //
GK21sokss_pu:24312: ity uktvā bhasma cakre sā taruṃ taṃ krodhavīkṣitam // SoKss_10,7.41 //
GK21sokss_pu:24314: taddṛṣṭvā sa cirādbhartā tuṣṭastām upagūḍhavān // SoKss_10,7.42 //
GK21sokss_pu:24315: nirāsa ca dvitīyāṃ tāṃ chittvā nāsāṃ kugehinīm /

GK21sokss_pu:24320: tathāpyeṣā na śakitā pāpaikā rakṣituṃ mayā // SoKss_10,7.45 //
GK21sokss_pu:24322: sādhvī yadi paraṃ svena śīlenaikena rakṣyate // SoKss_10,7.46 //
GK21sokss_pu:24328: āgatau sthaḥ kutaḥ kutra vrajathaḥ kathyatāmiti // SoKss_10,7.49 //
GK21sokss_pu:24330: viśvāsaṃ prāpya papraccha tam apy evaṃ kutūhalāt // SoKss_10,7.50 //
GK21sokss_pu:24331: na rahasyaṃ mahābhāga yadi tadbrūhi me 'dhunā /
GK21sokss_pu:24332: kastvamīdṛśi bhoge 'pi kiṃ ca te jalavāsitā // SoKss_10,7.51 //
GK21sokss_pu:24333: tac chrutvā śrūyatāṃ vacmīty uktvā sa puruṣastadā /

GK21sokss_pu:24336: svargakautūhalaṃ kartuṃ martyānām iva nirmame // SoKss_10,7.53 //
GK21sokss_pu:24345: tasmin samāptaprāye ca niyame śayane mama /
GK21sokss_pu:24346: pāpā haṭhād upetyaikā bhāryā suptavatī kila // SoKss_10,7.58 //
GK21sokss_pu:24347: tūrye tu yāme vismṛtya tadbrate tanniveṣaṇam /
GK21sokss_pu:24350: ihādya jātas te dve ca bhārye jāte ihāpi me // SoKss_10,7.60 //
GK21sokss_pu:24351: ekā sā kulaṭā pāpā dvitīyeyaṃ pativratā /
GK21sokss_pu:24353: jātiṃ smarāmi yadyac ca rātrau bhogā mamedṛśāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24354: yadi nākhaṇḍayiṣyaṃ tadidaṃ syānme na janma tat // SoKss_10,7.62 //
GK21sokss_pu:24357: tato 'sya sā satī bhāryā pūrvavṛttamavetya tat /
GK21sokss_pu:24358: vinyasya jānunī bhūmāv induṃ paśyantyabhāṣata // SoKss_10,7.64 //
GK21sokss_pu:24359: bho lokapālāḥ satyaṃ cedahaṃ sādhvī pativratā /
GK21sokss_pu:24360: tadambubāsamukto 'dya svargaṃ yātveṣa me patiḥ // SoKss_10,7.65 //
GK21sokss_pu:24361: ity uktavatyām evāsyāṃ khād vimānam avātarat /
GK21sokss_pu:24362: tadārūḍhau ca tau svargaṃ daṃpatī saha jagmatuḥ // SoKss_10,7.66 //
GK21sokss_pu:24364: tau ca viprau tadālokya vismayaṃ yayatuḥ param // SoKss_10,7.67 //
GK21sokss_pu:24365: nītvā ca rātriśeṣaṃ taṃ prabhāte sa yaśodharaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:24369: he viprau tiṣṭhataṃ tāvadahamadya karomi vām /
GK21sokss_pu:24370: snānānnapānair ātithyaṃ gṛhaṃ me hy āgatau yuvām // SoKss_10,7.70 //
GK21sokss_pu:24371: ity uktvā vyaramad vāk ca jajñe tatrāmbuvāpikā /

GK21sokss_pu:24382: śaṭhena sāyaṃ kenāpi bhojito 'smi balātpunaḥ // SoKss_10,7.76 //
GK21sokss_pu:24384: pūrṇaṃ yadyakariṣyaṃ tadabhaviṣyaṃ suro divi // SoKss_10,7.77 //
GK21sokss_pu:24385: evaṃ mayoktaḥ svodanto yuvāṃ kathayataṃ tu me /

GK21sokss_pu:24388: tatas tau brāhmaṇau yakṣaḥ punarevam abhāṣata // SoKss_10,7.79 //
GK21sokss_pu:24390: kṛtavidyau gṛhaṃ yātaṃ videśabhramaṇena kim // SoKss_10,7.80 //

GK21sokss_pu:24408: bhavitā yena devatvaṃ dehānte yuvayor iti // SoKss_10,7.89 //

GK21sokss_pu:24421: tatra taṃ gomukho bhūyo vinodayitum abravīt /

GK21sokss_pu:24429: tathaiva cākṣipannityaṃ phalāni sa tathaiva ca /
GK21sokss_pu:24430: śiśumāro rutaṃ cakre jajñe sakhyaṃ tatas tayoḥ // SoKss_10,7.100 //
GK21sokss_pu:24432: śiśumāro dinaṃ sthitvā sa sāyaṃ svagṛhaṃ yayau // SoKss_10,7.101 //
GK21sokss_pu:24433: jñātārthā tasya bhāryā ca sadā virahadaṃ divā /

GK21sokss_pu:24436: ityārtastaṃ sa papraccha śiśumāraḥ priyāṃ muhuḥ // SoKss_10,7.103 //
GK21sokss_pu:24437: nirbandhapṛṣṭāpi yadā na sā prativaco dadau /
GK21sokss_pu:24438: rahasyajñā sakhī tasyāstadā taṃ pratyabhāṣata // SoKss_10,7.104 //
GK21sokss_pu:24439: yady api tvaṃ na kuruṣe necchatyeṣā tathāpy aham /

GK21sokss_pu:24442: vinā vānarahṛtpadmayūṣaṃ na śamameti yaḥ // SoKss_10,7.106 //

GK21sokss_pu:24446: sakhyā kimathavā bhāryā prāṇebhyo 'py adhikapriyā // SoKss_10,7.108 //
GK21sokss_pu:24447: ityālocya svabhāryāṃ tāṃ śiśumāro jagāda saḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:24449: ity uktvā sa yayau yasya mittrasya nikaṭaṃ kapeḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24451: adyāpi na sakhe dṛṣṭaṃ gṛhaṃ bhāryā ca me tvayā /
GK21sokss_pu:24452: tadehi tatra gacchāvo viśramāyaikam apy ahaḥ // SoKss_10,7.111 //

GK21sokss_pu:24456: vānaraṃ śiśumāras taṃ gantuṃ pravavṛte 'tra saḥ // SoKss_10,7.113 //

GK21sokss_pu:24459: nirbandhenātha pṛcchantaṃ matvā hastasthitaṃ ca tam /

GK21sokss_pu:24463: śrutvaitatsa vacas tasya kapiḥ prājño vyacintayat /

GK21sokss_pu:24467: itthaṃ saṃcintya ca prāha śiśumāraṃ sa vānaraḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:24470: vāsodumbaravṛkṣe hi tadidānīṃ mama sthitam // SoKss_10,7.120 //
GK21sokss_pu:24474: tatra tenāntakeneva muktaḥ sa ca kapistaṭam // SoKss_10,7.122 //
GK21sokss_pu:24476: gaccha re mūrkha hṛdayaṃ dehādbhavati kiṃ pṛthak // SoKss_10,7.123 //
GK21sokss_pu:24477: mayaivaṃ mocito hy ātmā na cātraiṣyāmyahaṃ punaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24478: kimatra na śrutā mūrkha gardabhākhyāyikā tvayā // SoKss_10,7.124 //
GK21sokss_pu:24479: āsīdgomāyusacivaḥ siṃhaḥ ko'pi vane kva cit /
GK21sokss_pu:24482: āhato hetibhir jīvan katham apy aviśudguhām // SoKss_10,7.126 //
GK21sokss_pu:24483: tatra sthitaṃ gate tasmin rājñy anāhāraniḥsaham /
GK21sokss_pu:24485: nirgatya kiṃ yathāśakti nāhāraṃ cinuṣe prabho /
GK21sokss_pu:24486: sīdatyeva śarīraṃ te samaṃ parijanena yat // SoKss_10,7.128 //
GK21sokss_pu:24487: ity uktaḥ sa sṛgālena tena siṃho jagāda tam /
GK21sokss_pu:24488: sakhe nāhaṃ vraṇākrāntaḥ śaknomi bhramituṃ kva cit // SoKss_10,7.129 //
GK21sokss_pu:24490: tanme vraṇāni rohanti prakṛtistho bhavāmi ca // SoKss_10,7.130 //
GK21sokss_pu:24491: tadānaya kuto 'pi tvaṃ gatvā gardabhamāśu me /
GK21sokss_pu:24492: ity uktastena gomāyuḥ sa tatheti yayau tataḥ // SoKss_10,7.131 //
GK21sokss_pu:24494: prītyevopetya vakti sma durbalaḥ kiṃ bhavāniti // SoKss_10,7.132 //
GK21sokss_pu:24496: ity uktavantaṃ ca kharaṃ tam uvāca sa jambukaḥ // SoKss_10,7.133 //
GK21sokss_pu:24497: iha kiṃ vahasi kleśamehi tvāṃ prāpayāmy aham /
GK21sokss_pu:24498: vanaṃ svargasukhaṃ yatra kharībhiḥ saha vardhase // SoKss_10,7.134 //
GK21sokss_pu:24499: tac chrutvā sa tathety uktvā gardabho bhogalolupaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24500: vanaṃ siṃhasya tasyāgāttena gomāyunā saha // SoKss_10,7.135 //
GK21sokss_pu:24501: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva tasyaitya pṛṣṭhato gardabhasya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24503: sa tena vīkṣitastrastaḥ palāyya sahasā kharaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24504: āgacchanna ca taṃ siṃho 'py apatadvihvalākulaḥ // SoKss_10,7.137 //
GK21sokss_pu:24506: tatas taṃ jambuko mantrī sopālambham abhāṣata // SoKss_10,7.138 //
GK21sokss_pu:24508: hariṇādivadhe kā tadvārtā tava bhaviṣyati // SoKss_10,7.139 //
GK21sokss_pu:24509: tac chrutvā so 'bravītsiṃho yathā vetsi tathā punaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24510: tamānaya kharaṃ tāvat sajjo bhūtvā nihanmy aham // SoKss_10,7.140 //
GK21sokss_pu:24511: iti sa preṣitastena punaḥ siṃhena jambukaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24512: gatvā kharaṃ tamavadadvidrutaḥ kiṃ bhavāniti // SoKss_10,7.141 //
GK21sokss_pu:24514: taṃ ca bhūyaḥ sa gomāyurvihasya kharam abravīt // SoKss_10,7.142 //
GK21sokss_pu:24515: mithyaiva vibhramo dṛṣṭastvayā na tvatra tādṛśam /
GK21sokss_pu:24516: sattvamasti sukhaṃ hy atra vasāmy ahamapīdṛśaḥ // SoKss_10,7.143 //

GK21sokss_pu:26044: prārthitaḥ sa munirdhyātvā śāpāntaṃ nau samādiśat // SoKss_11,1.93 //
GK21sokss_pu:26049: ity uktvā sa mataṅgarṣiḥ kṛtvā snānādikāṃ kriyām /

GK21sokss_pu:26056: viyogabhīterabhavaṃ svaṃ deśaṃ prati sotsukaḥ // SoKss_11,1.99 //
GK21sokss_pu:26057: tataḥ pravṛttaś cāgantum ahaṃ prāpyām budhes taṭam /

GK21sokss_pu:26064: kṛpayā māṃ samāśvāsya nītavānāśramaṃ śanaiḥ // SoKss_11,1.103 //
GK21sokss_pu:26066: buddhvā ca sāvadhiṃ śāpaṃ dhṛtibandhaṃ vyadhātsa me // SoKss_11,1.104 //

GK21sokss_pu:26076: velāṃ vaṇigbhir ānītāṃ tena potena sādhubhiḥ // SoKss_11,1.109 //
GK21sokss_pu:26080: nirvṛto yāmi cedānīṃ svadeśaṃ dayitāyutaḥ // SoKss_11,1.111 //

GK21sokss_pu:26083: prādāc ca tāṃ svabhaginīm upacāravṛttim ālambya yuktimanurāgahṛtāya tasmai /

GK21sokss_pu:26085: sa ca tāmādāya vadhūṃ sāśvavaśāṃ ruciradevamāmantrya /

GK21sokss_pu:26101: jitaṃ smaraśarair yeṣu pauṣpeṣv api patatsviha /

GK21sokss_pu:26106: prāṇebhyo 'py adhikāṃ mene rukmiṇīm iva mādhavaḥ // SoKss_12,1.5 //
GK21sokss_pu:26107: ekadā ca niśi svapne nabhasāgatya divyayā /

GK21sokss_pu:26113: anayāhamihānīta iti matvā ca vīkṣya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:26116: kva tvamāliṅga māmehi priye madanamañcuke // SoKss_12,1.10 //
GK21sokss_pu:26118: rūpaṃ taddayitāyāḥ sā tasyāḥ kṛtvāliliṅga tam // SoKss_12,1.11 //
GK21sokss_pu:26119: tataḥ sa netre unmīlya dṛṣṭvā tāṃ svapriyākṛtim /

GK21sokss_pu:26121: sātha hitvā trapāṃ rūpaṃ svaṃ pradarśya jagāda tam /

GK21sokss_pu:26125: nītvātha tatra tāṃ rātriṃ yathāvatsa tayā saha /
GK21sokss_pu:26131: tāṃ durdine nirāhārāṃ bhakṣyārthaṃ jātu nirgatām /
GK21sokss_pu:26135: tataḥ sa hastī tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kareṇuṃ śāntavaikṛtaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26137: tato bhramaṃstayā sākaṃ sa gajo jātu tatkṛte /
GK21sokss_pu:26142: tadaivānyaṃ samāśritya vāraṇaṃ kvāpy agāttataḥ // SoKss_12,1.23 //
GK21sokss_pu:26143: tāvac ca pūrvaviśliṣṭā kariṇī tasya sā nijā /

GK21sokss_pu:26149: uddhārayām āsa ca tau vaśānāgau mahātapāḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:26152: mṛtyor viyogāc cottīrṇau yathākāmaṃ vijahratuḥ // SoKss_12,1.28 //
GK21sokss_pu:26154: prabhuṃ nojjhanti mittraṃ vā tārayanti tataḥ punaḥ // SoKss_12,1.29 //
GK21sokss_pu:26155: hīnajātyudbhavā ye tu teṣāṃ spṛśati nāśayam /

GK21sokss_pu:26164: tasyāṃ sa vāmadattākhyaṃ bhavyaṃ putramajījanat // SoKss_12,1.34 //
GK21sokss_pu:26166: bhāryāṃ śaśiprabhāṃ nāma pariṇinye pitṛpriyaḥ // SoKss_12,1.35 //
GK21sokss_pu:26168: prāvartata ca gārhasthye sa tayā bhāryayā saha // SoKss_12,1.36 //
GK21sokss_pu:26171: ekadā rājasevārthaṃ sthitas tatkaṭake ca saḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:26173: naṣṭamasmatkulaṃ putra yato bhāryā mayā tava /

GK21sokss_pu:26177: tatra guptaṃ sthito yāvat puṣpārāme praviśya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26181: tato bhuktavatā tena sākaṃ sā śasyanaṃ yayau /
GK21sokss_pu:26183: āḥ pāpau gacchathaḥ kveti vadatas tasya gehinī /
GK21sokss_pu:26184: sā dṛṣṭvotthāya dhigjālmety uktvā dhūliṃ mukhe nyadhāt // SoKss_12,1.44 //
GK21sokss_pu:26186: vāmadattaḥ smṛtistvasya tadbhāve na vyalupyata // SoKss_12,1.45 //
GK21sokss_pu:26187: tato mahiṣamadhye sā nikṣipya laguḍaiḥ śaṭhā /

GK21sokss_pu:26189: tadaiva taṃ ca kasyāpi vaṇijo mahiṣārthinaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26190: vikrīṇīte sma sā krūrā tiryaktvavivaśīkṛtam // SoKss_12,1.47 //
GK21sokss_pu:26195: iti taṃ cintayantaṃ ca tatrodvāṣpaṃ suduḥkhitam /
GK21sokss_pu:26197: sā buddhvā jñānataḥ sarvaṃ tadvṛttāntaṃ kṛpākulā /
GK21sokss_pu:26200: tasmai kāntimatīṃ nāma kanyāṃ duhitaraṃ dadau // SoKss_12,1.52 //
GK21sokss_pu:26201: ebhir āhatya durbhāryāmādyāṃ tāṃ vaḍavāṃ kuru /
GK21sokss_pu:26202: ity uktvā pradadau cāsmai sarṣapānabhimantritān // SoKss_12,1.53 //
GK21sokss_pu:26203: tataḥ sa tāṃ kāntimatīṃ bhāryāmādāya nūtanām /

GK21sokss_pu:26208: sa cakre bhojanaṃ baddhapratijño vairaśuddhaye // SoKss_12,1.56 //
GK21sokss_pu:26209: evaṃ tatra sthitasyāsya kāntimatyā samaṃ punaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:26215: tato 'tithir vismitaḥ sa taṃ papraccha sakautukaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:26288: tamāha śrūyatāṃ deva rātrau vṛttaṃ mamādya yat // SoKss_12,2.22 //
GK21sokss_pu:26291: utthite churikāhas te mayi so 'tha palāyitum /

GK21sokss_pu:26295: tayaiva setupṛthvyā ca yāvattīrṇo 'smi tāṃ nadīm /

GK21sokss_pu:26297: ko bhavāniti pṛṣṭaś ca mayā sa puruṣo 'bravīt /

GK21sokss_pu:26300: bhāryā mṛgāṅkadattasya kā bhaviṣyati me prabhoḥ // SoKss_12,2.28 //
GK21sokss_pu:26302: asyujjayinyāṃ nṛpatiḥ karmasena iti śrutaḥ // SoKss_12,2.29 //

GK21sokss_pu:26316: tāvan na tatra puṃsas tān apaśyāma na tajjalam // SoKss_12,2.36 //
GK21sokss_pu:26321: tasmānmuktāvalīṃ prāptāṃ śubhāṃ baddhvā mayā gale /
GK21sokss_pu:26323: tatkṣaṇaṃ ca prabuddho 'smi prayātā ca vibhāvarī /
GK21sokss_pu:26326: tvaṃ deva dhanyo yasyaivaṃ vihitānugraho haraḥ // SoKss_12,2.41 //
GK21sokss_pu:26327: svapne muktāvalīṃ labdhvā yatpītaś ca tvayāmbudhiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26328: tacchaśāṅkavatīṃ prāpya bhoktāsi pṛthivīṃ dhruvam // SoKss_12,2.42 //
GK21sokss_pu:26329: anyan manāk tu kleśāyety ukte vimalabuddhinā /
GK21sokss_pu:26330: tato mṛgāṅkadattas tān uvāca sacivān punaḥ // SoKss_12,2.43 //

GK21sokss_pu:26334: prajñābalānmayā prāpyā sā śaśāṅkavatī sutā // SoKss_12,2.45 //
GK21sokss_pu:26335: prajñābalaṃ ca sarveṣu mukhyaṃ kāryeṣu sādhanam /
GK21sokss_pu:26336: tathā ca śṛṇutātraitāṃ kathāṃ vaḥ kathayāmy aham // SoKss_12,2.46 //
GK21sokss_pu:26339: sa rājā taṃ nijāmātyaṃ kadācitsvair am abravīt /

GK21sokss_pu:26344: notsahe jīvituṃ cāhaṃ tayā tatsutayā vinā // SoKss_12,2.50 //
GK21sokss_pu:26345: tad atra nāstyupāyo me sakhe kiṃ kāryamucyatām /
GK21sokss_pu:26346: iti tenodite rājñā sa mantrī nijagāda tam // SoKss_12,2.51 //
GK21sokss_pu:26347: kiṃ deva vikramādeva siddhirasti na buddhitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26348: tadalaṃ cintayāhaṃ te svabuddhyā sādhayāmyadaḥ // SoKss_12,2.52 //
GK21sokss_pu:26354: sānugaḥ sa dadarśātra dūrād gṛhavinirgatām // SoKss_12,2.55 //
GK21sokss_pu:26356: nīyamānāṃ tricaturaiḥ puruṣaiḥ kvāpi sāyudhaiḥ // SoKss_12,2.56 //
GK21sokss_pu:26357: dhruvaṃ vyutthāya yāteyaṃ tatpaśyāmaḥ kva gacchati /

GK21sokss_pu:26359: gatvā praviṣṭā sā yatra tac ca gehaṃ vidūrataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26360: dṛṣṭvā nivāsasthānaṃ svam ājagāma tadaiva saḥ // SoKss_12,2.58 //
GK21sokss_pu:26361: prātaś ca hastipālasya hṛtārthā tāṃ gatāṃ priyām /
GK21sokss_pu:26365: āgacchāsmadguroḥ pārśvaṃ jñānī sarvaṃ hi vetti saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26366: ity uktvā ca tamāninyurnikaṭaṃ tasya mantriṇaḥ // SoKss_12,2.61 //
GK21sokss_pu:26367: sa ca hastipako dṛṣṭvā pādayoś ca praṇamya tam /
GK21sokss_pu:26369: so 'pi mantrī mṛṣā dhyātvā sābhijñānaṃ śaśaṃsa tat /
GK21sokss_pu:26370: sthānaṃ tasmai parair nītā puruṣair yatra sā niśi // SoKss_12,2.63 //
GK21sokss_pu:26371: tataḥ praṇamya taṃ gatvā samaṃ nagararakṣibhiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26372: sa hastipālakaḥ prāpya sthānaṃ tatparyaveṣṭayat // SoKss_12,2.64 //

GK21sokss_pu:27910: laguḍaiḥ pādaghātaiś ca brāhmaṇīṃ tāmatāḍayat // SoKss_12,5.208 //
GK21sokss_pu:27912: tataḥ sa kharamādāya dhāvakaḥ svagṛhaṃ yayau // SoKss_12,5.209 //
GK21sokss_pu:27913: snātvāgato 'tha tadbhartā tadbuddhvā vīkṣya tāṃ ca saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:27914: bhāryāṃ vipraḥ purādhyakṣaṃ gatvodvigno vyajijñapat // SoKss_12,5.210 //
GK21sokss_pu:27916: śrutvā tayor dvayor vādaṃ mūrkho vivṛtavānidam // SoKss_12,5.211 //
GK21sokss_pu:27918: kharabhāraṃ dvijo yāvat prakṛtistho bhavetkharaḥ // SoKss_12,5.212 //
GK21sokss_pu:27921: eṣo 'nayor dvayor daṇḍa ity ukte tena sa dvijaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:27930: pūrvaṃ rājā kurukṣetre malayaprabha ityabhūt // SoKss_12,5.218 //
GK21sokss_pu:27934: tvaṃ hi kalpadrumastāsāṃ tāś ca te kāmadhenavaḥ // SoKss_12,5.220 //
GK21sokss_pu:27936: khedāttaṃ so 'bravīdvatsa kiṃ me 'sti dhanamakṣayam // SoKss_12,5.221 //
GK21sokss_pu:27938: tattvam eva kimetāsāṃ na dhatse kalpavṛkṣatām // SoKss_12,5.222 //
GK21sokss_pu:27939: etac chrutvā pituścakre pratijñāṃ sa nṛpātmajaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:27940: martavyaṃ kalpavṛkṣatvaṃ sādhyaṃ vā tapasā mayā // SoKss_12,5.223 //
GK21sokss_pu:27942: ārūḍha eva tasmiṃś ca sa durbhikṣo nyavartata // SoKss_12,5.224 //
GK21sokss_pu:27944: svasminneva sa saṃjajñe nagare kalpapādapaḥ // SoKss_12,5.225 //
GK21sokss_pu:27946: prasāritābhiḥ śākhābhir dikṣu śabdaiś ca pakṣiṇām // SoKss_12,5.226 //
GK21sokss_pu:27947: dadau ca kāmānarthibhyo duṣprāpān api so 'nvaham /
GK21sokss_pu:27948: cakre ca tā nirākāṅkṣāḥ prajāḥ svargasthitā iva // SoKss_12,5.227 //
GK21sokss_pu:27952: yatra puṣpaiḥ phalai ramyair apyanyataravo 'py amī // SoKss_12,5.229 //
GK21sokss_pu:27954: tatra kalpatarurbhūtvā svasukhāya kathaṃ divam // SoKss_12,5.230 //
GK21sokss_pu:27956: ity udāraṃ vacas tasya śrutvā śakro 'bravītpunaḥ // SoKss_12,5.231 //
GK21sokss_pu:27959: tuṣṭo 'si cennaya svargaṃ prajā nārtho 'sti tena me /
GK21sokss_pu:27960: ahaṃ paropakāraikasiddhyai tapsye tapo mahat // SoKss_12,5.233 //
GK21sokss_pu:27961: ity uktavantaṃ stutvā taṃ sugatāśaṃ tatheti saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:27962: ādāya ca prajāstuṣṭaḥ surendrastridivaṃ yayau // SoKss_12,5.234 //
GK21sokss_pu:27963: so 'pi tāṃ tarutāṃ tyaktvā rājaputraḥ svarūpabhṛt /
GK21sokss_pu:27970: rāgimūrkhaḥ pratīhāro nāmnā cārumatiḥ śukaḥ // SoKss_12,5.238 //
GK21sokss_pu:27971: sa jātu pāśinā bhāryāṃ vyādhena nihatāṃ śukīm /
GK21sokss_pu:27973: tataḥ sa śukarājastaṃ yuktyā śokaṃ nivārayan /
GK21sokss_pu:27975: na sā tava mṛtā bhāryā pāśācchākunikasya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:27976: gatā palāyya dṛṣṭā hi jīvantyeva mayādhunā // SoKss_12,5.241 //
GK21sokss_pu:27977: darśayāmyehi tubhyaṃ tāmity uktvā sa nināya tam /
GK21sokss_pu:27980: tam abravīdiyaṃ sā te bhāryāṃ paśyeha tiṣṭhati // SoKss_12,5.243 //
GK21sokss_pu:27981: tac chrutvā vīkṣya cātrātmapratibimbaṃ sa mūḍhadhīḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:27982: hṛṣṭaḥ praviśya toye tāmāliliṅga cucumba ca // SoKss_12,5.244 //
GK21sokss_pu:27983: aprāpnuvan priyāsparśam aśṛṇvaṃs tadvacaś ca saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:27984: sparśālāpau priyā kiṃ me na dadātīty acintayat // SoKss_12,5.245 //
GK21sokss_pu:27988: gatvā sakhedo rājānaṃ taṃ hemaprabham abhyadhāt // SoKss_12,5.247 //
GK21sokss_pu:27989: deva bhāryā na sā sparśamālāpaṃ vā dadāti me /
GK21sokss_pu:27990: kiṃ caitayā pratikṣiptaṃ dattamāmalakaṃ mayā // SoKss_12,5.248 //
GK21sokss_pu:27991: etac chrutvā sa rājā taṃ śanaiḥ kṛcchrād ivābravīt /
GK21sokss_pu:27992: na yuktam etad vaktuṃ me vacmi snehāt tathāpi te // SoKss_12,5.249 //
GK21sokss_pu:27993: anyānuraktā hy adyaiṣā tvayi prītiṃ kathaṃ bhajet /
GK21sokss_pu:27994: darśayāmi ca te sākṣādehyatraiva jalāntare // SoKss_12,5.250 //
GK21sokss_pu:27995: ity uktvā tatra nītvā taṃ svaṃ tadīyaṃ ca vāriṇi /
GK21sokss_pu:27996: pratibimbe ubhe rājā tasmai śliṣṭe adarśayat // SoKss_12,5.251 //
GK21sokss_pu:27997: te dṛṣṭvaiva sa tāṃ bhāryāṃ mūrkho mastvānyasaṃgatām /
GK21sokss_pu:27998: saṃnivṛtya viraktastaṃ svaṃ rājānaṃ vyajijñapat // SoKss_12,5.252 //
GK21sokss_pu:27999: deva tvadupadeśo yan mayā mūḍhena na śrutaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28000: tasyaiṣa pākas tan me 'tra kartavyamadhunādiśa // SoKss_12,5.253 //
GK21sokss_pu:28001: iti taṃ kṛtavijñaptiṃ rājā hemaprabho 'tha saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28004: na punaḥ strīṣu viśvāso maṇimantrādyagocaraḥ // SoKss_12,5.255 //
GK21sokss_pu:28009: iti tenānuśiṣṭaḥ sa rājñā cārumatiḥ striyaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28016: anveṣṭum āyayuś caurā na ca prāpuḥ kuto'pi tat // SoKss_12,5.261 //
GK21sokss_pu:28017: tato 'tra vijane matvā tena tanmuninā hṛtam /
GK21sokss_pu:28018: praviśya maṭhikāṃ tasya caurāste bruvate smatam // SoKss_12,5.262 //
GK21sokss_pu:28019: are dambhamune muñca nītaṃ naḥ kāñcanaṃ kṣiteḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28020: caurāṇām apy aho caurastvamasmākam upasthitaḥ // SoKss_12,5.263 //
GK21sokss_pu:28021: ityākṣiptaḥ sa taiḥ pāpair ahṛtārtho mṛṣā muniḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28022: na nītaṃtanmayā kiṃcinna dṛṣṭaṃ cetyabhāṣata // SoKss_12,5.264 //
GK21sokss_pu:28023: tatas tair laguḍair duṣṭais tāḍito 'pi sa dasyubhiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28024: yadā tad eva vakti sma satyavāṅmunisattamaḥ // SoKss_12,5.265 //
GK21sokss_pu:28025: tadā te cicchidus tasya krūro 'yamiti taskarāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28026: kramāddhastau ca pādau ca nayane codapāṭayan // SoKss_12,5.266 //
GK21sokss_pu:28028: matvānyaluptaṃ svarṇaṃ te jagmuścaurā yathāgatam // SoKss_12,5.267 //
GK21sokss_pu:28029: prāptaś ca śekharajyotir nāma rājātra taṃ munim /
GK21sokss_pu:28031: tataḥ sa guruśokārtastaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadavetya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:28033: teṣāṃ vadhe pravṛttaṃ ca nṛpaṃ taṃ so 'bravīnmuniḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28036: tasya vā prerakā hyete tarhyeteṣām apikrudhaḥ // SoKss_12,5.271 //
GK21sokss_pu:28039: tatas tadeva me ghātyaṃ kiṃ ca yadyapakārataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28040: vadhyā ete kathaṃ nātra rakṣyāḥ syurupakārataḥ // SoKss_12,5.273 //
GK21sokss_pu:28042: kasya kuryāṃ tadetair me pūrṇaivopakṛtiḥ kṛtā // SoKss_12,5.274 //
GK21sokss_pu:28043: ityādibhiḥ sa bahubhir vākyaiḥ kṣāntiparo muniḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28048: kṣamāpāramitā tubhyaṃ dhair yapāramitāṃ śṛṇu // SoKss_12,5.277 //
GK21sokss_pu:28053: pratyahaṃ ca tathā kurvan pariśramam apārthakam /
GK21sokss_pu:28054: dadṛśe sa kumāreṇa kadācid vyomacāriṇā // SoKss_12,5.280 //
GK21sokss_pu:28056: bālo 'yamanukampyo me mama hyeṣa parigrahaḥ // SoKss_12,5.281 //
GK21sokss_pu:28057: iti saṃcintya tuṣṭena nītvā tena svaśaktitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28059: itthaṃ dhair yeṇa tuṣyanti devatā api te mayā /
GK21sokss_pu:28060: dhair yapāramitā proktā dhyānapāramitāṃ śṛṇu // SoKss_12,5.283 //
GK21sokss_pu:28063: sa tena pitrā sahito jātu rājakulaṃ gataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28066: vaṇikputrasya dṛṣṭvaiva viveśa hṛdi kanyakā // SoKss_12,5.286 //
GK21sokss_pu:28067: tataḥ sa gṛhamāgatya vinidro niśi pāṇḍuraḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28074: rūpaikasāro 'nāśvāsī na śṛṇoṣi na paśyasi // SoKss_12,5.290 //
GK21sokss_pu:28076: sakhye malayamālī svamabhiprāyaṃ śaśaṃsa tam // SoKss_12,5.291 //
GK21sokss_pu:28077: yuktā na te vaṇikputra rājaputrīṃ prati spṛhā /
GK21sokss_pu:28080: iti bruvansa ca yadā citrakṛnna śaśāka tam // SoKss_12,5.293 //
GK21sokss_pu:28084: āsīnmalayamālī tāṃ bhūṣayaṃś ca vaṇiksutaḥ // SoKss_12,5.295 //
GK21sokss_pu:28087: śanaiś ca tām ālapantīṃ cumbanādi ca kurvatīm /
GK21sokss_pu:28093: tatraikasya tarormūle taṃ niveśya paṭaṃ ca saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28099: tāvan malayamālī ca puṣpāṇyuccitya tatra saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28100: āgatya kṛṣṇasarpaṃ taṃ paṭe dṛṣṭvā vyacintayat // SoKss_12,5.303 //
GK21sokss_pu:28101: sarpaḥ kuto 'dhunātraiṣo vidhinā kiṃ nu nirmitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28106: etāṃ kṛṣṇāhinā tena daṣṭāṃ vigatajīvitām // SoKss_12,5.306 //
GK21sokss_pu:28107: tataḥ sa vismṛtapaṭo hāhety uktvaiva mohitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28111: patantam eva tasmāc ca pāṇibhyāṃ sa tamagrahīt /
GK21sokss_pu:28112: munīndraḥ prakaṭībhūya samāśvāsya jagāda ca // SoKss_12,5.309 //
GK21sokss_pu:28113: mūḍha vetsi na kiṃ yatsā rājaputrī svamandire /
GK21sokss_pu:28114: sthitā citrapaṭe caiṣā nirjīvā citraputrikā // SoKss_12,5.310 //
GK21sokss_pu:28115: tadāliṅgasi kāṃ kā vā tava daṣṭā mahāhinā /
GK21sokss_pu:28116: rāgiṇas te svasaṃkalpabhāvanābhrama eṣa kaḥ // SoKss_12,5.311 //
GK21sokss_pu:28118: yenedṛśānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ na punaryāsi pātratām // SoKss_12,5.312 //
GK21sokss_pu:28120: prabuddhaḥ sa vaṇikputraḥ praṇipatya jagāda tam // SoKss_12,5.313 //
GK21sokss_pu:28122: yathā tareyaṃ saṃsāraṃ prasādaṃ me tathā kuru // SoKss_12,5.314 //
GK21sokss_pu:28125: tato malayamālī sa vanaṃ gatvā tapobalāt /
GK21sokss_pu:28134: paratra ko 'bhyupāyo me kaṃ tatra śaraṇaṃ śraye // SoKss_12,5.320 //
GK21sokss_pu:28135: yadi vrajāmi śaraṇaṃ śaṃbhuṃ śaurimathātra tam /
GK21sokss_pu:28136: ko 'haṃ tayor yayor devā munayo 'nye ca sevakāḥ // SoKss_12,5.321 //
GK21sokss_pu:28138: taṃ citraguptaṃ seve 'haṃ sa rakṣenmāṃ svayuktitaḥ // SoKss_12,5.322 //
GK21sokss_pu:28141: iti saṃcintya tasyaiva bhaktimārabhate sma saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28146: uvāca citraguptas te prīto 'stvity ucyatāmiti // SoKss_12,5.326 //
GK21sokss_pu:28148: muktvā hariharādīṃste citraguptena kiṃ vada // SoKss_12,5.327 //
GK21sokss_pu:28149: tac chrutvā so 'py avādīttaṃ taskaraḥ siṃhavikramaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28150: kiṃ tavānena nārtho me tadanyair daivatair iti // SoKss_12,5.328 //
GK21sokss_pu:28152: tarhi me yadi bhāryāṃ svāṃ dadāsyevaṃ vadāmi tat // SoKss_12,5.329 //
GK21sokss_pu:28153: śrutvaivaitat sa hṛṣṭas tam avādīt siṃhavikramaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28154: abhīṣṭadaivataprītyai bhāryā dattaiva te mayā // SoKss_12,5.330 //
GK21sokss_pu:28156: saiṣa tuṣṭo 'smi tatkiṃ te karavai kathyatāmiti // SoKss_12,5.331 //
GK21sokss_pu:28158: bhagavanna yathā mṛtyurbhavenmama tathā kuru // SoKss_12,5.332 //
GK21sokss_pu:28159: tato 'bravīc citragupto mṛtyuḥ śakyo na rakṣitum /
GK21sokss_pu:28160: tathāpi tāvad yuktiṃ te kariṣye tāṃ ca me śṛṇu // SoKss_12,5.333 //
GK21sokss_pu:28162: kupiteneśvareṇeha punaḥ kāryāc ca nirmitaḥ // SoKss_12,5.334 //
GK21sokss_pu:28163: tataḥ prabhṛti yatraiva śveto vasati tatra saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28164: na jantūn bādhate 'pyānapyājñayā yantritaḥ prabhoḥ // SoKss_12,5.335 //
GK21sokss_pu:28165: sa cādhunā śvetamuniḥ pāre pūrvāmbudheḥ sthitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28166: taraṅgiṇīṃ nāma nadīṃ samuttīrya tapovane // SoKss_12,5.336 //
GK21sokss_pu:28167: tatra mṛtyoranākramye nītvā tvāṃ sthāpayāmy aham /
GK21sokss_pu:28168: taraṅgiṇyā idaṃ pāramāgantavyaṃ ca na tvayā // SoKss_12,5.337 //
GK21sokss_pu:28169: āgataṃ vā pramādāttvāṃ mṛtyur bādhiṣyate yadi /
GK21sokss_pu:28173: tataḥ kālena tatrasthaṃ netuṃ taṃ siṃhavikramam /
GK21sokss_pu:28175: tatra sthito dadarśānyam upāyaṃ na yadā tadā /
GK21sokss_pu:28176: sa tasmai prāhiṇoddivyāṃ striyaṃ nirmāya māyayā // SoKss_12,5.341 //
GK21sokss_pu:28177: sā gatvopetya taṃ yuktyā vaśīcakre vilāsinī /
GK21sokss_pu:28180: sataraṅgāṃ tarītuṃ tāṃ praviveśa taraṅgiṇīm // SoKss_12,5.343 //
GK21sokss_pu:28182: madhyenadi ca sā cakre pariskhalitamātmanaḥ // SoKss_12,5.344 //
GK21sokss_pu:28183: oghena hriyamāṇeva tāraṃ cakranda tatra sā /
GK21sokss_pu:28184: vīkṣase mriyamāṇāṃ māmāryaputra na rakṣasi // SoKss_12,5.345 //
GK21sokss_pu:28185: sṛgālavikramaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ na punaḥ siṃhavikramaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28187: sāpi strī vārivegena nīyamāneva tatra tam /
GK21sokss_pu:28193: pūrvaṃ kiṃ narakaṃ bhuṅkṣe kiṃ vā svargamitīha cet /
GK21sokss_pu:28195: svarge vasaṃś ca kurvīthāḥ puṇyaṃ taddārḍhyasiddhaye /
GK21sokss_pu:28197: ity uktaścitraguptena sa svair aṃ siṃhavikramaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28198: vilakṣo 'dhomukho bhītaḥ pratipede tatheti tat // SoKss_12,5.352 //
GK21sokss_pu:28200: kaccitko 'py asya puṇyāṃśaścaurasyāstyatra kiṃ na vā // SoKss_12,5.353 //
GK21sokss_pu:28205: re śubhāśubhayoḥ pūrvaṃ bhuṅkṣe kiṃ kathyatām iti /
GK21sokss_pu:28206: tataḥ prārthitavān pūrvaṃ sa śubhaṃ siṃhavikramaḥ // SoKss_12,5.356 //
GK21sokss_pu:28210: dvitīyaṃ divasaṃ prāpa sa svarge bhoganiḥspṛhaḥ // SoKss_12,5.358 //
GK21sokss_pu:28212: ārādhya śaṃkaraṃ prāpa jñānaṃ nirdagdhakilbiṣaḥ // SoKss_12,5.359 //
GK21sokss_pu:28223: tataḥ saṃdhyām upasthāya yathāvattatra tāṃ niśām /
GK21sokss_pu:28224: sa vinītamatī rājā somaśūraś ca ninyatuḥ // SoKss_12,5.365 //
GK21sokss_pu:28227: tataḥ sa somaśūrastam upāsīno guruṃ vane /
GK21sokss_pu:28229: kramāc ca tau samaṃ tatra guruśiṣyāvubhāvapi /
GK21sokss_pu:28245: upetya tādṛśaṃ taṃ ca vṛttāntaṃ paripṛcchya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:28246: ātitheyaḥ kṛtapraśno bodhisattvo jagāda saḥ // SoKss_12,5.376 //
GK21sokss_pu:28248: jīvitopāyam apy etaṃ kṣudhitāsnāṃ vadāmi vaḥ // SoKss_12,5.377 //
GK21sokss_pu:28250: mṛgas tiṣṭhati tanmāṃsaiḥ prāṇān rakṣata gacchata // SoKss_12,5.378 //
GK21sokss_pu:28252: sa vinītamatirbodhisattvaḥ pūrvaṃ tato yayau // SoKss_12,5.379 //
GK21sokss_pu:28253: prāpya tatkhātakaṃ kṛtvā mṛgarūpaṃ ca yogataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:28256: khātaṃ taddadṛśuścātra taṃ vipannasthitaṃ mṛgam // SoKss_12,5.381 //
GK21sokss_pu:28258: bhṛṣṭvā ca tasya māṃsāni te niḥśeṣāṇyabhakṣayan // SoKss_12,5.382 //
GK21sokss_pu:28259: tāvac ca tasya bhārye dve bodhisattvasya vihvale /
GK21sokss_pu:28265: tābhyām eva samaṃ cāśu tatkhātanikaṭaṃ yayau /
GK21sokss_pu:28266: yatrātithibhyas tenātmā datto 'sya guruṇā tathā // SoKss_12,5.386 //
GK21sokss_pu:28270: ānīyāgnipraveśaṃ te kurutaḥ sma pativrate // SoKss_12,5.388 //
GK21sokss_pu:28276: maivaṃ kṛthā mayā hyeṣa gurustava parīkṣataḥ // SoKss_12,5.391 //
GK21sokss_pu:28280: gatvā sa vīkṣate somaśūro yāvat sa tadguruḥ // SoKss_12,5.393 //
GK21sokss_pu:28282: bhāryābhyāṃ taiś ca kanakakalaśapramukhaiḥ saha // SoKss_12,5.394 //
GK21sokss_pu:28283: tataḥ sa taṃ sapatnīkaṃ paralokāgataṃ gurum /

GK21sokss_pu:28287: sattvāttuṣṭāś ca te tasmai vinītamataye varān /

GK21sokss_pu:29289: ity uccacāra tatkālaṃ suspaṣṭā bhāratī divaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:29292: atha tau kṛtasaṃskārāvavardhetāṃ śanaiḥ śiśū // SoKss_12,7.49 //
GK21sokss_pu:29296: hanti sma kaṇṭhe samarabhaṭo bhīmabhaṭaṃ haṭhāt // SoKss_12,7.51 //
GK21sokss_pu:29301: sā taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca buddhvā ca vṛttāntaṃ snehakātarā /

GK21sokss_pu:29306: sadā cābhibhavatyenaṃ na cāhaṃ deva vacmi te // SoKss_12,7.56 //
GK21sokss_pu:29307: idaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu jāne 'haṃ tavaiva syācchivaṃ katham /

GK21sokss_pu:29712: haṃsāvalyā ca lakṣmyā ca sahāsīttatra nirvṛtaḥ // SoKss_12,7.259 //
GK21sokss_pu:29713: dinaiś ca tasmai śvaśuro lāṭarājyaṃ samarpya tat /
GK21sokss_pu:29714: candrādityaḥ sa vṛddhaḥ sannaputraḥ prāvrajadvanam // SoKss_12,7.260 //
GK21sokss_pu:29716: samyaktaiḥ saptabhir vīraiḥ śaṅkhadattādibhiḥ saha // SoKss_12,7.261 //
GK21sokss_pu:29717: gateṣv atha dineṣv atra cārebhyo jātu so 'śṛṇot /
GK21sokss_pu:29719: abhiṣiktaṃ ca tena sve rāḍhārājye mumūrṣatā /
GK21sokss_pu:29720: putraṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ samarabhaṭaṃ taṃ nartakīsutam // SoKss_12,7.263 //
GK21sokss_pu:29722: tasmai sa dūtaṃ samarabhaṭāya prāhiṇon nṛpaḥ // SoKss_12,7.264 //
GK21sokss_pu:29724: yogyatā mama tat svaṃ hi lāṭarājye 'tra saty api // SoKss_12,7.265 //
GK21sokss_pu:29727: sa ca dūto drutaṃ gatvā lekhaṃ tasmai samarpayat /
GK21sokss_pu:29731: ayogya iti pitrā yo deśānnirvāsitaḥ purā /
GK21sokss_pu:29734: siṃhasya darśanaṃ prāpto jñāyate sa tu tādṛśaḥ // SoKss_12,7.270 //
GK21sokss_pu:29735: ityādyudgarjya lekhena saṃdiśya ca tathaiva tat /
GK21sokss_pu:29736: so 'pi bhīmabhaṭāya svaṃ pratidūtaṃ visṛṣṭavān // SoKss_12,7.271 //
GK21sokss_pu:29741: gaccha re dūta madvākyādbrūhi taṃ nartakīsutam /
GK21sokss_pu:29744: niścitaṃ tvāṃ praheṣyāmi vatsalasyāntikaṃ pituḥ // SoKss_12,7.275 //
GK21sokss_pu:29745: sajjo bhava dinair eva jānīhi prāptamatra mām /
GK21sokss_pu:29746: ity uktvā preṣya dūtaṃ taṃ yātrāṃ bhīmabhaṭo vyadhat // SoKss_12,7.276 //
GK21sokss_pu:29750: sāmantai rājaputraiś ca prasthitaiḥ sabalair diśaḥ // SoKss_12,7.278 //
GK21sokss_pu:29755: tāvac ca so 'pi samarabhaṭo buddhvā nṛpo 'kṣamī /
GK21sokss_pu:29757: milataḥ sma ca tau sainyajaladhī pūrvapaścimau /
GK21sokss_pu:29769: samaṃ mahābalaiḥ śūrair durmadair dviradair iva /
GK21sokss_pu:29771: bhagne ca sainye samarabhaṭaḥ so 'tha rathasthitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29776: hanti sma kumbhe samarabhaṭo bhīmabhaṭasya saḥ // SoKss_12,7.291 //
GK21sokss_pu:29778: tatas tau virathau dvāvapyabhūtāṃ pādacāriṇau // SoKss_12,7.292 //
GK21sokss_pu:29779: gṛhītacarmakhaḍgau ca padātī eva tau tadā /
GK21sokss_pu:29782: dharmāpekṣī na taṃ śatruṃ tathā bhīmabhaṭo 'vadhīt // SoKss_12,7.294 //
GK21sokss_pu:29790: sa rāma iva kauśalyāṃ darśanotkāmanandayat // SoKss_12,7.298 //
GK21sokss_pu:29794: śubhe 'hni śaṅkhadattāya lāṭarājyaṃ sa dattavān // SoKss_12,7.300 //
GK21sokss_pu:29797: tair yukto 'tha sa tatrāsīt praśāsan paitṛkaṃ padam /
GK21sokss_pu:29798: lāṭendrasutayā devyā haṃsāvalyā tayā saha // SoKss_12,7.302 //
GK21sokss_pu:29807: tataḥ kruddho muniḥ so 'smai rājñe śāpamadādimam /
GK21sokss_pu:29808: madāndha rājyād bhraṣṭas tvaṃ vanyo hastī bhaviṣyasi // SoKss_12,7.307 //
GK21sokss_pu:29809: tac chrutvā sa bhayādbhraṣṭamado nirgatya bhūpatiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29810: dīnaiḥ prāsādayadvākyair muniṃ taṃ caraṇānataḥ // SoKss_12,7.308 //
GK21sokss_pu:29818: sa cātithiste cakṣuṣmāneva saṃpadyate tadā // SoKss_12,7.312 //
GK21sokss_pu:29819: ity uktvaiva muniḥ prāyāduttaṅkaḥ sa yathāgatam /
GK21sokss_pu:29820: so 'pi bhīmabhaṭo hastī saṃpanno rājyavicyutaḥ // SoKss_12,7.313 //
GK21sokss_pu:29821: tam imaṃ māṃ gajībhūtaṃ viddhi bhīmabhaṭaṃ sakhe /
GK21sokss_pu:29822: sa ca pracaṇaśaktistvaṃ jāne śāpānta eṣa me // SoKss_12,7.314 //
GK21sokss_pu:29823: evam uktvā gajākāraṃ tyaktvā bhīmabhaṭo 'tra saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29826: tatkālam eva saṃjajñe paśyan gandharvam atra tam // SoKss_12,7.316 //
GK21sokss_pu:29827: tāvac ca vallījālāntaḥ sthitaḥ śrutvā tayoḥ kathām /
GK21sokss_pu:29830: pracaṇḍaśaktiṃ jagrāha kaṇṭhe taṃ nijamantriṇam // SoKss_12,7.318 //
GK21sokss_pu:29836: yadasmābhir ayaṃ labdhaḥ sakhā yaccāmunā punaḥ // SoKss_12,7.321 //
GK21sokss_pu:29838: śrutvaitatso 'pi gandharvo rājaputram uvāca tam // SoKss_12,7.322 //
GK21sokss_pu:29839: acirāt sacivāñ śeṣāṃl labdhvā kṛtsnān avāpsyasi /
GK21sokss_pu:29840: tāṃ śaśāṅkavatīṃ bhāryāṃ sāmrājyaṃ ca mahītale // SoKss_12,7.323 //
GK21sokss_pu:29841: tadadhair yaṃ na kāryaṃ te kalyāṇinsādhayāmy aham /
GK21sokss_pu:29842: tadā ca saṃnidhāsye te yadā tvaṃ māṃ smariṣyasi // SoKss_12,7.324 //
GK21sokss_pu:29843: iti sa vigataśāpaḥ prāptakalyāṇatoṣaḥ prakaṭitasakhibhāvo rājaputraṃ tamuktvā /
GK21sokss_pu:29845: so 'pi pracaṇḍaśaktiṃ prāpya vane tatra mantribhiḥ sahitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29846: anayan mṛgāṅkadatto jātavṛtir nṛpasutas tadahaḥ // SoKss_12,7.326 //
GK21sokss_pu:29847: iti mahākaviśrīsomadevabhaṭṭaviracite kathāsaritsāgare śaśāṅkavatīlambake saptamas taraṅgaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29852: tato 'tivāhya rātriṃ tāṃ prabhāte kānanāt tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29855: mṛgāṅkadattaḥ prayayau cinvañ śeṣān svamantrinaḥ // SoKss_12,8.3 //
GK21sokss_pu:29858: darśyate cānyamantribhyo yāvat tena sa saṃbhramāt /
GK21sokss_pu:29859: tāvat sa mantrī gaganāt tatsamīpe 'vatīrṇavān // SoKss_12,8.5 //
GK21sokss_pu:29860: avaruhya ca tasyāśu puṃsaḥ skandhād upetya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29862: tenāśliṣṭaś ca hṛṣṭena tathā tanmantribhiḥ kramāt /
GK21sokss_pu:29863: visasarja pumāṃsaṃ taṃ smṛto 'bhyeṣyasi mām iti // SoKss_12,8.7 //
GK21sokss_pu:29865: pṛṣṭaḥ svodantam ācakhyau vane vikramakesarī // SoKss_12,8.8 //
GK21sokss_pu:29867: bahūny ahāni cinvāno yuṣmān aham acintayam // SoKss_12,8.9 //
GK21sokss_pu:29868: gacchāmy ujjayinīṃ tatra gantavyaṃ tair dhruvaṃ yataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29869: evaṃ niścitya ca prāyām ahaṃ tāṃ nagarīṃ prati // SoKss_12,8.10 //
GK21sokss_pu:29873: ita uttiṣṭha mā putra madīyāṃ gatim āpsyasi // SoKss_12,8.12 //
GK21sokss_pu:29874: ihāsti hi mahāsarpo yena daṣṭo rujārditaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29875: udyato 'syāṃ mahāvāpyām eṣo 'haṃ deham ujjhitam // SoKss_12,8.13 //
GK21sokss_pu:29876: ity uktavantaṃ kṛpayā dehatyāgān nivārya tam /
GK21sokss_pu:29877: tatrākārṣam ahaṃ vipraṃ nirviṣaṃ viṣavidyayā // SoKss_12,8.14 //
GK21sokss_pu:29878: tataḥ sa vipraḥ sākūtam udantaṃ kṛtsnam ādarāt /
GK21sokss_pu:29879: pṛṣṭvā māṃ prītimān evaṃ viditārtho 'bhyabhāṣata // SoKss_12,8.15 //
GK21sokss_pu:29880: prāṇās tvayā mama prattā tat pravīra gṛhāṇa me /
GK21sokss_pu:29881: vetālasādhanaṃ mantram imaṃ prāptaṃ mayā pituḥ // SoKss_12,8.16 //
GK21sokss_pu:29883: mādṛśāḥ punar ete na klībāḥ kiṃ nāma kurvate // SoKss_12,8.17 //
GK21sokss_pu:29884: ity uktas tena tam ahaṃ pratyavocaṃ dvijottamam /
GK21sokss_pu:29885: mṛgāṅkadattaviyuto vetālaiḥ kiṃ karomy aham // SoKss_12,8.18 //
GK21sokss_pu:29886: tac chrutvā sa vihasyaivaṃ vipro māṃ punar abravīt /
GK21sokss_pu:29887: kiṃ na jānāsy abhīṣṭaṃ yad vetālāt sarvam āpyate // SoKss_12,8.19 //
GK21sokss_pu:29889: kiṃ trivikramasenena na prāptaṃ bhūbhujā purā // SoKss_12,8.20 //
GK21sokss_pu:29890: tathā ca kathayāmy etāṃ tadīyāṃ te kathāṃ śṛṇu pratiṣṭhānābhidhāno 'sti deśo godāvarītaṭe // SoKss_12,8.21 (Vet_0.1) //
GK21sokss_pu:29892: prāk trivikramasenākhyaḥ khyātakīrtir abhūn nṛpaḥ // SoKss_12,8.22 (Vet_0.2) //
GK21sokss_pu:29894: sevārthaṃ kṣāntiśīlākhyo bhikṣuḥ phalam upānayat // SoKss_12,8.23 (Vet_0.3) //
GK21sokss_pu:29895: so 'pi rājā tad ādāya phalam āsannavartinaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29897: itthaṃ gateṣu varṣeṣu daśasv atra kilaikadā /
GK21sokss_pu:29898: dattvā rājñe phalaṃ tasmai bhikṣāv āsthānato gate // SoKss_12,8.25 (Vet_0.5) //
GK21sokss_pu:29899: sa rājā tat phalaṃ prādāt praviṣṭāyātra daivataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29901: sa markaṭas tad aśnāti yāvat tāvat phalāt tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29902: vibhinnamadhyān niragād anarghaṃ ratnam uttamam // SoKss_12,8.27 (Vet_0.7) //
GK21sokss_pu:29903: tad dṛṣṭvādāya papraccha taṃ bhāṇḍāgārikaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29904: bhikṣūpanītāni mayā yāni nityaṃ phalāni te // SoKss_12,8.28 (Vet_0.8) //
GK21sokss_pu:29905: haste dattāni tāni kva sthāpitāni sadā tvayā /
GK21sokss_pu:29906: tac chrutvā taṃ sa sabhayaḥ koṣādhyakṣo vyajijñapat // SoKss_12,8.29 (Vet_0.9) //
GK21sokss_pu:29907: kṣiptāni tāny anudghāṭya mayā gañje gavākṣataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29908: yady ādiśasi tad deva tam udghāṭya gaveṣaye // SoKss_12,8.30 (Vet_0.10) //
GK21sokss_pu:29909: ity ūcivān anumato rājñā gatvā kṣaṇena saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29910: koṣādhyakṣaḥ samāgatya prabhuṃ vyajñāpayat punaḥ // SoKss_12,8.31 (Vet_0.11) //
GK21sokss_pu:29911: śīrṇāni nātra paśyāmi koṣe tāni phalāny aham /
GK21sokss_pu:29912: ratnarāśiṃ tu paśyāmi raśmijvālākulaṃ vibho // SoKss_12,8.32 (Vet_0.12) //
GK21sokss_pu:29913: tac chrutvā tān manīn dattvā tuṣṭo 'smai koṣarakṣiṇe /
GK21sokss_pu:29914: rājānyedyur apṛcchat sa bhikṣuṃ taṃ prāgvad āgatam // SoKss_12,8.33 (Vet_0.13) //
GK21sokss_pu:29915: bhikṣo dhanavyayenaivaṃ sevase māṃ kim anvaham /
GK21sokss_pu:29916: nedānīṃ te grahīṣyāmi phalaṃ yāvan na vakṣyasi // SoKss_12,8.34 (Vet_0.14) //
GK21sokss_pu:29917: ity uktavantaṃ rājānaṃ bhikṣus taṃ vijane 'bravīt /
GK21sokss_pu:29920: tac chrutvā pratipede tat tathety asya sa bhūpatiḥ // SoKss_12,8.36 (Vet_0.16) //
GK21sokss_pu:29921: tataḥ sa śramaṇas tuṣṭo nṛpaṃ puna uvāca tam /
GK21sokss_pu:29925: bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmīty ukte tena mahībhujā /
GK21sokss_pu:29926: sa kṣāntiśīlaḥ śramaṇo hṛṣṭaḥ svanilayaṃ yayau // SoKss_12,8.39 (Vet_0.19) //
GK21sokss_pu:29927: atha tāṃ sa mahāsattvaḥ prāpya kṛṣṇacaturdaśīm /
GK21sokss_pu:29928: prārthanāṃ pratipannāṃ tāṃ bhikṣos tasya nṛpaḥ smaran // SoKss_12,8.40 (Vet_0.20) //
GK21sokss_pu:29936: sphūrjan mahāśivārāvaṃ śmaśānaṃ tad avihvalaḥ // SoKss_12,8.44 (Vet_0.24) //
GK21sokss_pu:29937: vicitya cātra taṃ prāpya bhikṣuṃ vaṭataror adhaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29938: kurvāṇaṃ maṇḍalanyāsam upasṛtya jagāda saḥ // SoKss_12,8.45 (Vet_0.25) //
GK21sokss_pu:29939: eṣo 'ham āgato bhikṣo brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te /
GK21sokss_pu:29940: tac chrutvā sa nṛpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭo bhikṣur uvāca tam // SoKss_12,8.46 (Vet_0.26) //
GK21sokss_pu:29941: rājan kṛtaḥ prasādaś cet tad ito dakṣiṇāmukham /
GK21sokss_pu:29942: gatvā vidūram ekākī vidyate śiṃśapātaruḥ // SoKss_12,8.47 (Vet_0.27) //
GK21sokss_pu:29943: tasminn ullambitamṛtaḥ ko 'py ekaḥ puruṣaḥ sthitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29944: tam ihānaya gatvā tvaṃ sānāthyaṃ kuru vīra me // SoKss_12,8.48 (Vet_0.28) //
GK21sokss_pu:29945: tac chrutvaiva tathety uktvā sa rājā satyasaṃgaraḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29946: dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ālambya pravīraḥ prayayau tataḥ // SoKss_12,8.49 (Vet_0.29) //
GK21sokss_pu:29948: gatvā tamasi taṃ prāpa kathaṃcic chiṃśapātarum // SoKss_12,8.50 (Vet_0.30) //
GK21sokss_pu:29950: so 'paśyal lambamānaṃ taṃ bhūtasyeva śavaṃ taroḥ // SoKss_12,8.51 (Vet_0.31) //
GK21sokss_pu:29951: āruhya cātra bhūmau taṃ chinna rajjum apātayat /
GK21sokss_pu:29952: patitaś cātra so 'kasmāc cakranda vyathito yathā // SoKss_12,8.52 (Vet_0.32) //
GK21sokss_pu:29953: tato 'varuhya kṛpayā jīvāśaṅkī sa tasya yat /
GK21sokss_pu:29954: rājāṅgaṃ prāmṛśat tena so 'ṭṭahāsaṃ vyadhāc chavaḥ // SoKss_12,8.53 (Vet_0.33) //
GK21sokss_pu:29955: tataḥ sa rājā matvā taṃ vetālādhiṣṭhitaṃ tadā /
GK21sokss_pu:29956: kiṃ hasasy ehi gacchāva iti yāvad akampitaḥ // SoKss_12,8.54 (Vet_0.34) //
GK21sokss_pu:29957: vakti tāvan na bhūmau savetālaṃ śavam aikṣata /
GK21sokss_pu:29958: aikṣatātraiva vṛkṣe tu lambamānaṃ sthitaṃ punaḥ // SoKss_12,8.55 (Vet_0.35) //
GK21sokss_pu:29960: vajrād api hi vīrāṇāṃ cittaratnam akhaṇḍitam // SoKss_12,8.56 (Vet_0.36) //
GK21sokss_pu:29961: āropya ca savetālaṃ skandhe maunena taṃ śavam /
GK21sokss_pu:29962: sa trivikramaseno 'tha rājā gantuṃ pracakrame // SoKss_12,8.57 (Vet_0.37) //
GK21sokss_pu:29964: rājann adhvavinodāya kathām ākhyāmi te śṛṇu // SoKss_12,8.58 (Vet_0.38) //
GK21sokss_pu:29970: tasyāṃ pratāpamukuṭo nāma rājābhavat purā // SoKss_12,8.61 (Vet_1.3) //
GK21sokss_pu:29975: tena sakhyā saha krīḍan sa kadācin nṛpātmajaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:29976: jagāma dūram adhvānaṃ mṛgayāti prasaṅgataḥ // SoKss_12,8.64 (Vet_1.6) //
GK21sokss_pu:29978: chindac charaiḥ saṭālāni viveśaikaṃ mahāvanam // SoKss_12,8.65 (Vet_1.7) //
GK21sokss_pu:29983: tasmiṃs tadaiva sarasi snānārthaṃ kācid āgatā /
GK21sokss_pu:29984: tena divyākṛtiḥ kanyā dadṛśe saparicchadā // SoKss_12,8.68 (Vet_1.10) //
GK21sokss_pu:29988: sā jahāra manas tasya rājaputrasya tatkṣaṇam // SoKss_12,8.70 (Vet_1.12) //
GK21sokss_pu:29989: so 'py ahārṣīt tathā tasyā yuvā dṛṣṭvā vilocane /
GK21sokss_pu:29990: yathā naikṣata sā kanyā lajjāṃ svām apy alaṃkṛtim // SoKss_12,8.71 (Vet_1.13) //
GK21sokss_pu:29991: yūni paśyati tasmin sā keyaṃ syād iti sānuge /
GK21sokss_pu:29994: ciraṃ ca dantaracanāṃ cakārādāya ca vyadhāt // SoKss_12,8.73 (Vet_1.15) //
GK21sokss_pu:29995: padmaṃ śirasi sākūtaṃ hṛdaye cādadhe karam /
GK21sokss_pu:29996: rājaputraś ca tasyās tāṃ saṃjñāṃ na jñātavāṃs tadā // SoKss_12,8.74 (Vet_1.16) //
GK21sokss_pu:29997: mantriputras tu bubudhe sa sakhā tasya buddhimān /
GK21sokss_pu:29998: kṣaṇāc ca sā yayau kanyā nīyamānānugais tataḥ // SoKss_12,8.75 (Vet_1.17) //
GK21sokss_pu:29999: prāpya ca svagṛhaṃ tasthau paryaṅge 'ṅgaṃ nidhāya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:30000: cittaṃ tu nijasaṃjñārtham āsthāt tasmin nṛpātmaje // SoKss_12,8.76 (Vet_1.18) //
GK21sokss_pu:30002: gatvā svanagarīṃ kṛcchrāṃ prāpāvasthāṃ tayā vinā // SoKss_12,8.77 (Vet_1.19) //
GK21sokss_pu:30003: sakhyā ca mantriputreṇa tena pṛṣṭas tadā rahaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30004: śaṃsatā tām aduṣprāpāṃ tyaktadhairyo jagāda saḥ // SoKss_12,8.78 (Vet_1.20) //
GK21sokss_pu:30005: yasyā na nāma na grāmo nānvayo vāvabudhyate /

GK21sokss_pu:30239: ity ākarṇya vimuktamaunam udite samyaṅ nṛpeṇottare skandhāt tasya sa dārḍhyam ākalayituṃ māyābalāt tatkṣaṇam /

GK21sokss_pu:30242: tato 'tra puna ānetuṃ taṃ vetālam agān nṛpaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:30281: tanmūrtaṃ kilbiṣam idaṃ na bhokṣye 'nnam ihādhunā // SoKss_12,9.20 (Vet_2.20) //
GK21sokss_pu:30282: evaṃ vadantaṃ taṃ so 'tra gṛhasthaḥ prāha paśya me /

GK21sokss_pu:30392: vṛddhā mṛtā nipatyāpi śvabhre nāhaṃ mṛtā punaḥ // SoKss_12,10.33 (Vet_3.33) //
GK21sokss_pu:30394: uddhṛtāhaṃ tataḥ śvabhrāt prāptāsmīha ca daivataḥ // SoKss_12,10.34 (Vet_3.34) //
GK21sokss_pu:30395: evam uktavatī mātrā pitrā cāśvāsitā tataḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:30405: bhītāya ca tatas tasmai tad aśeṣaṃ nyavedayat /

GK21sokss_pu:30407: tatas tayā samaṃ tatra nirbhayaḥ śvāśure gṛhe /
GK21sokss_pu:30408: praviṣṭaḥ śvaśurābhyāṃ sa harṣād dṛṣṭvābhyanandyata // SoKss_12,10.41 (Vet_3.41) //
GK21sokss_pu:30409: diṣṭyā jīvann ayaṃ muktaś caurair iti mahotsavaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:30848: tatrādhunaiva yatraiṣo jñānī vadati tāṃ sthitām // SoKss_12,12.33 (Vet_5.33) //
GK21sokss_pu:30849: ity uktvā tatkṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā rathaṃ sarvāstrasaṃyutam /
GK21sokss_pu:30852: jñāninā tāṃ samākhyātāṃ vasatiṃ tatra rakṣasaḥ // SoKss_12,12.35 (Vet_5.35) //
GK21sokss_pu:30858: ardhacandreṇa bāṇena śūras tasyācchinac chiraḥ // SoKss_12,12.38 (Vet_5.38) //
GK21sokss_pu:30859: hate rakṣasi tāṃ somaprabhām āptāṃ tadāspadāt /
GK21sokss_pu:30863: jñānī jagāda nāhaṃ cej jānīyāṃ tad iyaṃ katham /
GK21sokss_pu:30864: prāpyeta kanyā gūḍhasthā deyā mahyam asāv itaḥ // SoKss_12,12.41 (Vet_5.41) //
GK21sokss_pu:30865: vijñānī tv avadan nāhaṃ kuryāṃ ced vyomagaṃ ratham /
GK21sokss_pu:30866: gamāgamau kathaṃ syātāṃ devānām iva vaḥ kṣaṇāt // SoKss_12,12.42 (Vet_5.42) //
GK21sokss_pu:30867: kathaṃ syāc cārathaṃ yuddhaṃ rathinā rakṣasā saha /
GK21sokss_pu:30868: tasmān mahyam iyaṃ deyā lagno hy eṣa mayājitaḥ // SoKss_12,12.43 (Vet_5.43) //
GK21sokss_pu:30869: śūro 'py uvāca hanyāṃ cen nāhaṃ taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe /
GK21sokss_pu:30870: tad yuvābhyāṃ kṛte yatne 'py etāṃ kanyāṃ ka ānayet // SoKss_12,12.44 (Vet_5.44) //
GK21sokss_pu:30871: tan mahyam eṣā dātavyety evaṃ teṣu vivādiṣu /
GK21sokss_pu:30872: harisvāmī kṣaṇaṃ tūṣṇīm āsīd udbhrāntamānasaḥ // SoKss_12,12.45 (Vet_5.45) //
GK21sokss_pu:30873: tat kasmai sātra deyeti rājan vadatu me bhavān /
GK21sokss_pu:30874: na vadiṣyasi jānaṃś cet tat te mūrdhā sphuṭiṣyati // SoKss_12,12.46 (Vet_5.46) //
GK21sokss_pu:30875: iti vetālatas tasmāc chrutvā maunaṃ vihāya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:30876: sa trivikramasenas tam uvācaivaṃ mahīpatiḥ // SoKss_12,12.47 (Vet_5.47) //
GK21sokss_pu:30878: arjitā bahuvīryeṇa hatvā taṃ yudhi rākṣasam // SoKss_12,12.48 (Vet_5.48) //
GK21sokss_pu:30879: jñānivijñāninau tv asya dhātrā karmakarau kṛtau /
GK21sokss_pu:30880: sadā gaṇakatakṣāṇau paropakaraṇe na kim // SoKss_12,12.49 (Vet_5.49) //
GK21sokss_pu:30881: ity uktaṃ manujapater niśamya tasya skandhāgrāt sapadi sa pūrvavaj jagāma /
GK21sokss_pu:30882: vetālo nijapadam eva so 'pi rājānudvegaḥ punar api taṃ prati pratasthe // SoKss_12,12.50 (Vet_5.50) //
GK21sokss_pu:30884: tato gatvā punas tasmāt prāpya taṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30885: vetālaṃ prāgvad ādāya skandhe maunena bhūpatiḥ // SoKss_12,13.1 (Vet_6.1) //
GK21sokss_pu:30887: tāvat pathi sa vetālo bhūyo 'py evam uvāca tam // SoKss_12,13.2 (Vet_6.2) //
GK21sokss_pu:30888: rājan sudhīḥ susattvaś ca bhavāṃs tena priyo 'si me /
GK21sokss_pu:30889: ato vinodinīṃ vacmi kathāṃ praśnaṃ ca me śṛṇu // SoKss_12,13.3 (Vet_6.3) //
GK21sokss_pu:30890: āsīd rājā yaśaḥketur iti khyāto mahītale /
GK21sokss_pu:30891: tasya śobhāvatī nāma rājadhāny abhavat purī // SoKss_12,13.4 (Vet_6.4) //
GK21sokss_pu:30892: tasyām abhūn nagaryāṃ ca gauryāyatanam uttamam /
GK21sokss_pu:30893: tasya dakṣiṇataś cāsīd gaurītīrthābhidhaṃ saraḥ // SoKss_12,13.5 (Vet_6.5) //
GK21sokss_pu:30895: yātrāyāṃ snātum eti sma nānādigbhyo mahājanaḥ // SoKss_12,13.6 (Vet_6.6) //
GK21sokss_pu:30896: ekadā ca tithau tasyāṃ snātum atrāyayau yuvā /
GK21sokss_pu:30897: rajako dhavalo nāma grāmād brahmasthalābhidhāt // SoKss_12,13.7 (Vet_6.7) //
GK21sokss_pu:30901: anviṣya tannāmakule kāmārto 'tha gṛhaṃ yayau // SoKss_12,13.9 (Vet_6.9) //
GK21sokss_pu:30903: pṛṣṭho mātrārtayā tasyai tac chaśaṃsa manogatam // SoKss_12,13.10 (Vet_6.10) //
GK21sokss_pu:30904: sā gatvā vimalākhyāya tat svabhartre nyavedayat /
GK21sokss_pu:30905: so 'py āgatya tathāvasthaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sutam abhyadhāt // SoKss_12,13.11 (Vet_6.11) //
GK21sokss_pu:30907: sa hi madyācitaḥ śuddhapaṭo dāsyati te sutām // SoKss_12,13.12 (Vet_6.12) //
GK21sokss_pu:30908: anyūnā hi vayaṃ tasmāt kulenārthena karmaṇā /
GK21sokss_pu:30909: taṃ vedmy ahaṃ sa māṃ vetti tenaitan me na duḥkaram // SoKss_12,13.13 (Vet_6.13) //
GK21sokss_pu:30910: ity āśvāsya sa taṃ putram āhārādau pravartya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:30912: yayāce cātra putrasya tasyārthe dhavalasya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30913: kanyāṃ tasmāt sa cāsmai tāṃ pratiśuśrāva sādaram // SoKss_12,13.15 (Vet_6.15) //
GK21sokss_pu:30914: lagnaṃ niścitya cānyedyus tāṃ sa śuddhapaṭaḥ sutām /
GK21sokss_pu:30915: dhavalāya dadau tasmai tulyāṃ madanasundarīm // SoKss_12,13.16 (Vet_6.16) //
GK21sokss_pu:30916: kṛtodvāhaś ca sa tayā sākaṃ darśanasaktayā /
GK21sokss_pu:30917: bhāryayā svapitur gehaṃ jagāma dhavalaḥ kṛtī // SoKss_12,13.17 (Vet_6.17) //
GK21sokss_pu:30921: saṃbandhipṛṣṭakuśalo viśrāntaś ca jagāda tān // SoKss_12,13.19 (Vet_6.19) //
GK21sokss_pu:30923: tātena preṣito yasmād devīpūjotsavo 'sti naḥ // SoKss_12,13.20 (Vet_6.20) //
GK21sokss_pu:30925: te saṃbandhyādayaḥ sarve tad ahas tam upācaran // SoKss_12,13.21 (Vet_6.21) //
GK21sokss_pu:30926: prātar madanasundaryā svaśuryeṇa ca tena saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30927: sahito dhavalaḥ prāyād gṛhaṃ tac chvāśuraṃ prati // SoKss_12,13.22 (Vet_6.22) //
GK21sokss_pu:30928: prāpya śobhāvatīṃ tāṃ ca purīm ātmatṛtīyakaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30929: dadarśa nikaṭaṃ prāpya sa gauryāyatanaṃ mahat // SoKss_12,13.23 (Vet_6.23) //
GK21sokss_pu:30930: nijagāda ca tau bhāryāśvaśuryau śraddhayā tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30931: etam etāṃ bhagavatīṃ paśyāmo devatām iha // SoKss_12,13.24 (Vet_6.24) //
GK21sokss_pu:30932: tac chrutvā sa śvaśuryas taṃ niṣedhaṃ pratyabhāṣata /
GK21sokss_pu:30933: iyanto riktahastāḥ kiṃ paśyāmo devatām iti // SoKss_12,13.25 (Vet_6.25) //
GK21sokss_pu:30934: ahaṃ tāvad vrajāmy eko yuvām atraiva tiṣṭhatam /
GK21sokss_pu:30935: ity uktvā dhavalo draṣṭuṃ devīṃ tāṃ sa tato yayau // SoKss_12,13.26 (Vet_6.26) //
GK21sokss_pu:30936: praviśyāyatanaṃ tasyāḥ praṇamya ca vibhāvya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:30941: ahaṃ tu siddhyai kiṃ naitāṃ prīṇāmy ātmopahārataḥ // SoKss_12,13.29 (Vet_6.29) //
GK21sokss_pu:30943: khaḍgaṃ sāṃyātrikaiḥ kaiścid devyāḥ prāk prābhṛtīkṛtam // SoKss_12,13.30 (Vet_6.30) //
GK21sokss_pu:30945: cicchedaitena khaḍgena tac chinnaṃ cāpatad bhuvi // SoKss_12,13.31 (Vet_6.31) //
GK21sokss_pu:30946: ciraṃ yāvat sa nāyāti tāvad gatvā tam īkṣitum /
GK21sokss_pu:30947: tatraiva devībhavane tacchvaśuryo viveśa saḥ // SoKss_12,13.32 (Vet_6.32) //
GK21sokss_pu:30949: vyāmohitas tathaiva svaṃ śiras tenāsinācchinat // SoKss_12,13.33 (Vet_6.33) //
GK21sokss_pu:30950: so 'pi yāvac ca nāyāti tāvad udbhrāntamānasā /
GK21sokss_pu:30952: praviśya dṛṣṭvaiva patiṃ bhrātaraṃ ca tathāgatau /
GK21sokss_pu:30953: hā kim etad dhatāsmīti vilapanty apatad bhuvi // SoKss_12,13.35 (Vet_6.35) //
GK21sokss_pu:30954: kṣaṇāc cotthāya śocantī tāv akāṇḍahatāv ubhau /
GK21sokss_pu:30955: kiṃ mamāpy adhunānena jīvitenety acintayat // SoKss_12,13.36 (Vet_6.36) //
GK21sokss_pu:30956: vyajijñapac ca devīṃ tāṃ dehatyāgonmukhī satī /
GK21sokss_pu:30960: hṛtāv ekapade kasmād bhartā bhrātā ca me tvayā /
GK21sokss_pu:30961: na yuktam etan mayi te nityabhaktā hy ahaṃ tvayi // SoKss_12,13.39 (Vet_6.39) //
GK21sokss_pu:30962: tan me śritāyāḥ śaraṇaṃ śṛṇv ekaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ vacaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30963: etāṃ tāvat tyajāmy atra daurbhāgyopahatāṃ tanum // SoKss_12,13.40 (Vet_6.40) //
GK21sokss_pu:30964: janiṣye devi bhūyas tu yatra kutrāpi janmani /
GK21sokss_pu:30965: tatraitāv eva bhūyāstāṃ dvau bhartṛbhrātarau mama // SoKss_12,13.41 (Vet_6.41) //
GK21sokss_pu:30966: iti saṃstutya vijñapya devīṃ natvā ca tāṃ punaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30968: tatrārpayati yāvac ca pāśe kaṇṭhaṃ vitatya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:30970: mā kṛthāḥ sāhasaṃ putri bālāyā api te 'munā /
GK21sokss_pu:30971: sattvotkarṣeṇa tuṣṭāsmi pāśam etaṃ parityaja // SoKss_12,13.44 (Vet_6.44) //
GK21sokss_pu:30973: uttiṣṭhatāṃ te jīvantāv etau dvāv api madvarāt // SoKss_12,13.45 (Vet_6.45) //
GK21sokss_pu:30974: etac chrutvaiva saṃtyajya pāśaṃ harṣād upetya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:30978: tato 'kṣatāṅgau jīvantāv ubhāv uttasthatuś ca tau /
GK21sokss_pu:30981: praṇamya devīṃ śarvānīṃ yatheṣṭaṃ te yayus trayaḥ // SoKss_12,13.49 (Vet_6.49) //
GK21sokss_pu:30982: yāntī ca dṛṣṭvā svakṛtaṃ śirovinimayaṃ tayoḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30984: tad brūhi rājan ko bhartā tasyāḥ saṃkīrṇayos tayoḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30985: purvoktaḥ syāt sa śāpas te jānāno na bravīṣi cet // SoKss_12,13.51 (Vet_6.51) //
GK21sokss_pu:30986: ity ākarṇya kathāpraśnaṃ rājā vetālatas tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30987: sa trivikramaseno 'tra tam evaṃ pratyabhāṣata // SoKss_12,13.52 (Vet_6.52) //
GK21sokss_pu:30988: yat saṃsthaṃ tatpatiśiraḥ saiṣa tasyāḥ patis tayoḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30989: pradhānaṃ ca śiro 'ṅgeṣu pratyabhijñā ca tadgatā // SoKss_12,13.53 (Vet_6.53) //
GK21sokss_pu:30990: ity uktavato nṛpates tasyāṃsāt punar atarkitaḥ sa yayau /
GK21sokss_pu:30991: vetālaḥ sa ca rājā jagāma bhūyas tam ānetum // SoKss_12,13.54 (Vet_6.54) //
GK21sokss_pu:30993: tato gatvā punaḥ prāpya vetālaṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:30994: sa trivikramasenas taṃ skandhe jagrāha bhūpatiḥ // SoKss_12,14.1 (Vet_7.1) //
GK21sokss_pu:30995: gṛhītvā prasthitaṃ taṃ ca vetālaḥ so 'bravīt pathi /
GK21sokss_pu:30996: rājañ śramavinodārthaṃ kathām ākhyāmi te śṛṇu // SoKss_12,14.2 (Vet_7.2) //
GK21sokss_pu:30998: caṇḍasenābhidhānaś ca rājā tasyām abhūt puri // SoKss_12,14.3 (Vet_7.3) //
GK21sokss_pu:31000: hartā ca śatrulakṣmīṇāṃ na paradravyasaṃpadām // SoKss_12,14.4 (Vet_7.4) //
GK21sokss_pu:31003: tatra cātmānam āvedya nairdhanyāttaṃ nṛpaṃ prati /
GK21sokss_pu:31005: tataḥ kārpaṭiko bhūtvā bahūny abdāni tatra saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31006: tasthau kurvan sadā sevān naiva prāpa phalaṃ nṛpāt // SoKss_12,14.7 (Vet_7.7) //
GK21sokss_pu:31007: yadi rājānvaye janma nirdhanatvaṃ kim īdṛśam /
GK21sokss_pu:31008: nirdhanatve 'pi kiṃ dhātrā kṛteyaṃ me mahecchatā // SoKss_12,14.8 (Vet_7.8) //
GK21sokss_pu:31009: ayaṃ hi sevamānaṃ mām evaṃ kliṣṭaparicchadam /
GK21sokss_pu:31010: ciraṃ kṣudhāvasīdantaṃ rājā nādyāpi vīkṣate // SoKss_12,14.9 (Vet_7.9) //
GK21sokss_pu:31011: iti yāvac ca sa dhyāyaty atra kārpaṭikas tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31012: tāvad ākheṭakārthaṃ sa niragād ekadā nṛpaḥ // SoKss_12,14.10 (Vet_7.10) //
GK21sokss_pu:31016: anudhāvan kṣaṇāt prāpad atidūraṃ vanāntaram // SoKss_12,14.12 (Vet_7.12) //
GK21sokss_pu:31018: śrānto mahāvane so 'tha rājā diṅmoham āyayau // SoKss_12,14.13 (Vet_7.13) //
GK21sokss_pu:31019: ekaḥ kārpaṭikaś cātha sa taṃ vātāśvapṛṣṭhagam /
GK21sokss_pu:31021: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtam anvāyātaṃ sa bhūpatiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31022: sasneham avadat kaccid vetsi mārgaṃ yathāgatam // SoKss_12,14.15 (Vet_7.15) //
GK21sokss_pu:31024: vedmi kiṃ ca kṣaṇaṃ tāvad iha viśrāmyatu prabhuḥ // SoKss_12,14.16 (Vet_7.16) //
GK21sokss_pu:31027: etac chrutvā sa rājā taṃ soparodham abhāṣata /
GK21sokss_pu:31028: tarhi kvāpīha pānīyaṃ bhavatā prekṣyatām iti // SoKss_12,14.18 (Vet_7.18) //
GK21sokss_pu:31029: tathety āruhya sa tatas tuṅgaṃ kārpaṭikas tarum /
GK21sokss_pu:31030: nadīṃ dṛṣṭvāvaruhyātha nṛpaṃ tatra nināya tam // SoKss_12,14.19 (Vet_7.19) //
GK21sokss_pu:31034: prakṣālyopānayat tasmai hṛdyāny āmalakāni saḥ // SoKss_12,14.21 (Vet_7.21) //
GK21sokss_pu:31035: etāni kuta ity etaṃ pṛcchantaṃ sa ca bhūpatim /
GK21sokss_pu:31039: tac chrutvā satyanāmā tvaṃ sattvaśīlaḥ kim ucyate /
GK21sokss_pu:31040: ity uktvā sa kṛpākrānto hrītaś cācintayan nṛpaḥ // SoKss_12,14.24 (Vet_7.24) //
GK21sokss_pu:31041: dhiṅ nṛpān kliṣṭam akliṣṭaṃ ye bhṛtyeṣa na jānate /
GK21sokss_pu:31042: dhik ca taṃ parivāraṃ yo na jñāpayati tāṃs tathā // SoKss_12,14.25 (Vet_7.25) //
GK21sokss_pu:31045: bhuktvā ca tan nipīyāmbu viśaśrāmātra sa kṣaṇam /
GK21sokss_pu:31047: tataḥ sajjīkṛtaṃ tena vāhaṃ kārpaṭikena saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31050: yayau sa rājā svapuriṃ pathi prāptātmasainikaḥ // SoKss_12,14.29 (Vet_7.29) //
GK21sokss_pu:31051: tatra prakhyāpya tadbhaktiṃ vasubhir viṣayaiś ca tam /
GK21sokss_pu:31052: apūrayat kārpaṭikaṃ na cāmanyata niṣkṛtim // SoKss_12,14.30 (Vet_7.30) //
GK21sokss_pu:31055: ekadā tena rājñā ca sa siṃhalapateḥ sutām /
GK21sokss_pu:31058: āruroha pravahaṇaṃ rājādiṣṭaiḥ saha dvijaiḥ // SoKss_12,14.33 (Vet_7.33) //
GK21sokss_pu:31060: uttasthau jaladhes tasmād dhvajo janitavismayaḥ // SoKss_12,14.34 (Vet_7.34) //
GK21sokss_pu:31064: bhṛśaṃ varṣitum ārebhe vavau tīvraś ca mārutaḥ // SoKss_12,14.36 (Vet_7.36) //
GK21sokss_pu:31065: tair varṣavātaiḥ sa balād ākṛṣyādhoranair iva /
GK21sokss_pu:31067: tāvac ca sa dhvajas tasmin vāridhau vīciviplute /
GK21sokss_pu:31068: vahanena samaṃ tena prāvartata nimajjitum // SoKss_12,14.38 (Vet_7.38) //
GK21sokss_pu:31069: tato dvijās te tatrasthāś caṇḍasiṃhaṃ svabhūpatim /
GK21sokss_pu:31076: vahanaṃ tac ca tatstāś ca nipetur yādasāṃ mukhe // SoKss_12,14.42 (Vet_7.42) //
GK21sokss_pu:31077: sa ca magno 'mbudhau tatra sattvaśīlo nirīkṣate /
GK21sokss_pu:31078: yāvat tāvad dadarśātra purīṃ divyāṃ na vāridhim // SoKss_12,14.43 (Vet_7.43) //
GK21sokss_pu:31083: tatra praṇamya devīṃ tāṃ stutyābhyarcya tadagrataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31084: indrajālaṃ kim etat syād ity āścaryād upāviśat // SoKss_12,14.46 (Vet_7.46) //
GK21sokss_pu:31086: akasmān niragāt kanyā divyodghāṭya kavāṭakam // SoKss_12,14.47 (Vet_7.47) //
GK21sokss_pu:31090: viveśa sattvaśīlasya hṛdayaṃ ca tataḥ samam // SoKss_12,14.49 (Vet_7.49) //
GK21sokss_pu:31092: na punaḥ sattvaśīlasya hṛdayāt sā kathaṃ cana // SoKss_12,14.50 (Vet_7.50) //
GK21sokss_pu:31094: sattvaśīlo 'py asau tasyāḥ paścāt tatra praviṣṭavān // SoKss_12,14.51 (Vet_7.51) //
GK21sokss_pu:31095: praviśya ca dadarśāntar anyad evottamaṃ puram /

GK21sokss_pu:31323: aham eṣāṃ niḥkaitavam adhikaṃ jānāmi tūlikācaṅgam // SoKss_12,15.50 (Vet_8.50) //
GK21sokss_pu:31325: itarābhyāṃ hi bhavet tat pūrvaṃ jātv anyato 'vagatam // SoKss_12,15.51 (Vet_8.51) //
GK21sokss_pu:31326: iti tasyoktavato 'ṃsād vetālo bhūpater yayau prāgvat /

GK21sokss_pu:31334: citādhūmair iva dhvāntair niruddhaṃ pitṛkānanam // SoKss_12,16.3 (Vet_9.3) //
GK21sokss_pu:31335: kaṣṭaṃ kīdṛg graho 'yaṃ te bhikṣos tasyānurodhataḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:31340: kṛtādiṣu triṣu khyātā kalāv ujjayinīti ca // SoKss_12,16.6 (Vet_9.6) //
GK21sokss_pu:31341: tasyāṃ ca vīradevākhyo rājābhūd bhūbhṛtāṃ varaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:31343: so 'tha rājā tayā sākaṃ gatvā mandākinītaṭe /

GK21sokss_pu:31349: śrutvaitāṃ nābhasīṃ vāṇīṃ siddhābhīṣṭaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:31354: ity anaṅgaratir nāmnā pitrā tena vyadhāyi sā // SoKss_12,16.13 (Vet_9.13) //
GK21sokss_pu:31355: vṛddhiṃ gatāyās tasyāś ca sa pitā sadṛśaṃ varam /

GK21sokss_pu:31357: teṣv eko 'pi na yat tasya tattulyaḥ pratyabhāsata /
GK21sokss_pu:31358: tena rājā sa vātsalyāt tāṃ sutāṃ pratyabhāṣata // SoKss_12,16.15 (Vet_9.15) //
GK21sokss_pu:31359: ahaṃ tāvan na paśyāmi sadṛśaṃ putri te varam /

GK21sokss_pu:31361: etat pitṛvacaḥ śrutvā rājaputrī jagāda sā /

GK21sokss_pu:31363: kiṃ tv ekaṃ vetti yo 'pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ svākṛtir yuvā /

GK21sokss_pu:31365: ity anaṅgarates tasyāḥ śrutvā svaduhitur vacaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31366: tādṛśaṃ tadvaraṃ yāvad anviṣyati sa bhūpatiḥ // SoKss_12,16.19 (Vet_9.19) //
GK21sokss_pu:31367: tāvat tallokato buddhvā catvāras tam upāyayuḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31368: vīrā vijñānino bhavyāḥ puruṣā dakṣiṇāpathāt // SoKss_12,16.20 (Vet_9.20) //
GK21sokss_pu:31369: te rājñā pūjitās tasmai svaṃ svaṃ vijñānam ekaśaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:31374: ekaṃ ca parigṛhṇāmi vāsasor ātmanaḥ kṛte // SoKss_12,16.23 (Vet_9.23) //
GK21sokss_pu:31375: ekaṃ dadāmi bhāryāyai yadi sā bhavatīha me /

GK21sokss_pu:31378: ity ekenodite tena dvitīyaḥ puruṣo 'bravīt // SoKss_12,16.25 (Vet_9.25) //
GK21sokss_pu:31380: rutaṃ vedmi tad eṣā me rājaputrī pradīyatām // SoKss_12,16.26 (Vet_9.26) //
GK21sokss_pu:31381: evam ukte dvitīyena tṛtīyaḥ proktavāṃs tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31382: ahaṃ khaḍgadharo nāma doḥśālī kṣatriyo nṛpa // SoKss_12,16.27 (Vet_9.27) //
GK21sokss_pu:31384: tad eṣā tanayā rājaṃs tvayā mahyaṃ vitīryatām // SoKss_12,16.28 (Vet_9.28) //
GK21sokss_pu:31385: ity ukte tu tṛtīyena caturtha idam abhyadhāt /
GK21sokss_pu:31386: vipro 'haṃ jīvadattākhyo vijñānaṃ ca mamedṛśam // SoKss_12,16.29 (Vet_9.29) //
GK21sokss_pu:31387: jantūṃ mṛtān apy ānīya darśayāmy āśu jīvataḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:31389: evaṃ vaktṝn sa tān paśyan divyaveṣākṛtīn nṛpaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31391: ity ākhyāya kathām etāṃ vetālaḥ pṛṣṭavān nṛpam /
GK21sokss_pu:31393: tad bhavān vaktu tāvan me kasmai deyā viśāmpate /
GK21sokss_pu:31394: teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ madhyāt sā kanyānaṅgaratir bhavet // SoKss_12,16.33 (Vet_9.33) //
GK21sokss_pu:31395: etac chrutvā sa rājā taṃ vetālaṃ pratyabhāṣata /

GK21sokss_pu:31403: tasmāt tasmai kṣatriyāya caturthāya samāya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:31405: etat tasya vaco niśamya nṛpater aṃsasthalāt pūrvavat vetālaḥ sa jagāma yogabalataḥ svasthānam evāśu tat /
GK21sokss_pu:31406: bhūpālo 'pi sa taṃ tathaiva punar apy ānetum anvag yayau utsāhaikaghane hi vīrahṛdaye nāpnoti khedo 'ntaram // SoKss_12,16.39 (Vet_9.39) //
GK21sokss_pu:31409: rājā jagrāha vetālaṃ punar aṃse cacāla ca // SoKss_12,17.1 (Vet_10.1) //
GK21sokss_pu:31410: prayāntaṃ ca tam āha sma vetālaḥ so 'ṃsapṛṣṭhagaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31411: śrānto 'si rājaṃs tad imāṃ śṛṇu śramaharāṃ kathām // SoKss_12,17.2 (Vet_10.2) //
GK21sokss_pu:31413: vīrabāhur iti khyāto nāmnā pārthivasattamaḥ // SoKss_12,17.3 (Vet_10.3) //
GK21sokss_pu:31425: iyaṃ me mānasaṃ bhettuṃ bhallī māreṇa nirmitā // SoKss_12,17.9 (Vet_10.9) //
GK21sokss_pu:31426: ity ādi yāvad dhyāyan sa nirvarṇayati tāṃ ciram /

GK21sokss_pu:31432: tāṃ vijñāyaiva sumukhīṃ naktam abhyantare gatām /
GK21sokss_pu:31434: tāvad gatvā gṛhaṃ tāṃ sa dharmadatto 'nucintayan /
GK21sokss_pu:31435: tasthau nipatya śayane candrapādāhato luṭhan // SoKss_12,17.14 (Vet_10.14) //
GK21sokss_pu:31437: na kiṃcit kathayām āsa smaragrahavimohitaḥ // SoKss_12,17.15 (Vet_10.15) //
GK21sokss_pu:31438: niśi kṛcchrāc ca saṃprāptanidraḥ svapne tathaiva tām /

GK21sokss_pu:31444: kanyāhaṃ paradārāś ca na tavāsmīha saṃpratam /
GK21sokss_pu:31445: pitrā samudradattāya dattāhaṃ vaṇije yataḥ // SoKss_12,17.19 (Vet_10.19) //
GK21sokss_pu:31446: dinaiḥ katipayair eva vivāho bhavitā ca me /
GK21sokss_pu:31447: tad gaccha tūṣṇīṃ mā kaścit paśyed doṣo bhavet tataḥ // SoKss_12,17.20 (Vet_10.20) //
GK21sokss_pu:31448: ity uktaḥ sa tayāty arthaṃ dharmadatto jagāda tām /
GK21sokss_pu:31449: yad astu me na jīveyaṃ vinā hi bhavatīm aham // SoKss_12,17.21 (Vet_10.21) //
GK21sokss_pu:31451: tam uvāca vivāho me tāvat saṃpadyatām iha // SoKss_12,17.22 (Vet_10.22) //
GK21sokss_pu:31453: tato 'haṃ tvām upaiṣyāmi niścitaṃ praṇayārjitā // SoKss_12,17.23 (Vet_10.23) //

GK21sokss_pu:31456: ity uktā tena sāvādīt kṛtodvāhaiva tarhy aham /
GK21sokss_pu:31457: pūrvaṃ tvām upayāsyāmi tato 'bhyeṣyāmi taṃ patim // SoKss_12,17.25 (Vet_10.25) //
GK21sokss_pu:31458: evam uktavatīṃ tasmin nojjhati pratyayaṃ vinā /
GK21sokss_pu:31459: vaṇikputre saśapathaṃ satyavācaṃ babandha sā // SoKss_12,17.26 (Vet_10.26) //

GK21sokss_pu:31463: sā patyā samam adhyāsta śayanīyagṛhaṃ niśi // SoKss_12,17.28 (Vet_10.28) //
GK21sokss_pu:31467: tat sa nābhimato 'smy asyā nūnam ity akarod dhṛdi // SoKss_12,17.30 (Vet_10.30) //
GK21sokss_pu:31468: jagāda cānabhimato yady ahaṃ tava sundari /

GK21sokss_pu:31470: tac chrutvā sā natamukhī śanair evam uvāca tam /
GK21sokss_pu:31471: tvaṃ me prāṇādhikaḥ preyān vijñaptiṃ kiṃ tu me śṛṇu // SoKss_12,17.32 (Vet_10.32) //
GK21sokss_pu:31472: anutiṣṭha saharṣaṃ ca prayaccha ca mamābhayam /

GK21sokss_pu:31476: ekākinīṃ gṛhodyāne dṛṣṭvā mām ekadā yuvā /

GK21sokss_pu:31479: mayā haṭhapravṛttasya tasya vāksaṃyamaḥ kṛtaḥ // SoKss_12,17.36 (Vet_10.36) //
GK21sokss_pu:31480: pūrvaṃ kṛtavivāhā tvām upaiṣyāmi tataḥ priyam /
GK21sokss_pu:31481: tan me satyavacaḥ pālyam anumanyasva tat prabho // SoKss_12,17.37 (Vet_10.37) //
GK21sokss_pu:31482: yāvat tan nikaṭaṃ gatvā kṣaṇenopaimi te 'ntikam /

GK21sokss_pu:31485: samudradattaḥ satyena baddhaḥ kṣaṇam acintayat // SoKss_12,17.39 (Vet_10.39) //

GK21sokss_pu:31487: tatsatyaṃ hanmi kiṃ yātu ko 'syāḥ pariṇayagrahaḥ // SoKss_12,17.40 (Vet_10.40) //
GK21sokss_pu:31489: sāpy utthāya tatas tasmān niryayau pativeśmanaḥ // SoKss_12,17.41 (Vet_10.41) //
GK21sokss_pu:31492: tatas tamaḥsv apy āśliṣya sthiteṣv adridarī priyāḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:31497: uvāca kiṃ tavānena muñca kāryam ihāsti me // SoKss_12,17.45 (Vet_10.45) //
GK21sokss_pu:31498: tataś cauro 'bravīn mattaś caurāt tvaṃ mucyase katham /
GK21sokss_pu:31499: tac chrutvā sāvadat taṃ ca gṛhāṇābharaṇāni me // SoKss_12,17.46 (Vet_10.46) //
GK21sokss_pu:31500: atha cauro 'bhyadhān mugdhe kim ebhir upalair mama /
GK21sokss_pu:31503: jagadābharaṇaṃ naiva mokṣyāmi bhavatīm aham // SoKss_12,17.48 (Vet_10.48) //
GK21sokss_pu:31504: ity uktā tena caureṇa vivaśā sā vaṇiksutā /
GK21sokss_pu:31505: ākhyāya nijavṛttāntam evaṃ prārthayate sma tam // SoKss_12,17.49 (Vet_10.49) //
GK21sokss_pu:31506: kṣamasva me kṣaṇaṃ yāvat kṛtvā satyānupālanam /

GK21sokss_pu:31508: nāham ullaṅghayiṣyāmi bhadra satyām imāṃ giram /

GK21sokss_pu:31510: tasthau pratīkṣamānaś ca tatraiva sa tadāgamam /
GK21sokss_pu:31511: sāpi tasyāntikaṃ dharmadattasya vaṇijo yayau // SoKss_12,17.52 (Vet_10.52) //
GK21sokss_pu:31512: sa cābhīṣṭām api prāptāṃ tathā tāṃ vijane sthitām /
GK21sokss_pu:31513: dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā yathāvṛttaṃ vicintya kṣaṇam abravīt // SoKss_12,17.53 (Vet_10.53) //
GK21sokss_pu:31514: satyena tava tuṣṭo 'smi kiṃ tvayā me parastriyā /
GK21sokss_pu:31515: yāvat tvāṃ nekṣate kaścit tāvad gaccha yathāgatam // SoKss_12,17.54 (Vet_10.54) //
GK21sokss_pu:31516: iti tena parityaktā sā tathety āyayau tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31517: caurasya nikaṭaṃ tasya pratipālayataḥ pathi // SoKss_12,17.55 (Vet_10.55) //
GK21sokss_pu:31518: brūhi kas te 'tra vṛttānto gatāyā iti pṛcchate /
GK21sokss_pu:31519: tasmai sā tena vaṇijā yathā muktā tathābravīt // SoKss_12,17.56 (Vet_10.56) //
GK21sokss_pu:31520: tataḥ sa cauro 'vādīt tāṃ yady evaṃ tan mayāpy asi /
GK21sokss_pu:31521: vimuktā satyatuṣṭena gṛhaṃ sābharaṇā vraja // SoKss_12,17.57 (Vet_10.57) //
GK21sokss_pu:31522: evaṃ tenāpi sā tyaktā rakṣitā cānuyāyinā /
GK21sokss_pu:31523: aluptaśīlā muditā patyur evāyayau gṛham // SoKss_12,17.58 (Vet_10.58) //
GK21sokss_pu:31524: tatra guptaṃ praviṣṭā sā prahṛṣṭopāgatā satī /
GK21sokss_pu:31525: dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭavate tasmai patye sarvam avarṇayat // SoKss_12,17.59 (Vet_10.59) //
GK21sokss_pu:31529: tasthau samudradatto 'tha tayā saha yathāsukham // SoKss_12,17.61 (Vet_10.61) //
GK21sokss_pu:31530: iti tatra kathām uktvā pitṛvanabhūmau tadā sa vetālaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:31531: vadati sma taṃ trivikramasenaṃ vasudhādhipaṃ bhūyaḥ // SoKss_12,17.62 (Vet_10.62) //
GK21sokss_pu:31532: tad brūhi cauravaṇijām eṣāṃ madhyān narendra kas tyāgī /
GK21sokss_pu:31533: jānan yadi na vadiṣyasi vidaliṣyati te śiraḥ śatadhā // SoKss_12,17.63 (Vet_10.63) //
GK21sokss_pu:31534: tac chrutvā sa mahīpatir ujjhitamaunas tam āha vetālam /
GK21sokss_pu:31535: eṣāṃ cauras tyāgī na punar vaṇijāv ubhāv api tau // SoKss_12,17.64 (Vet_10.64) //
GK21sokss_pu:31536: yo hi patis tām ajahād atyājyāṃ tādṛśīṃ vivāhyāpi /
GK21sokss_pu:31537: kulajaḥ so 'nyāsaktāṃ bhāryāṃ jānan kathaṃ vahatu // SoKss_12,17.65 (Vet_10.65) //
GK21sokss_pu:31538: yo 'py aparaḥ sa bhayāt tām atyākṣīt kālajīrṇasaṃvegaḥ /
